His activity starts when he gets up in the morning and continues until night depending on the amount of work he has.  His difficulty is the work tools because his machines have been intensely used. 

He’s married and his wife works for a cosmetics firm.  He’s asking for the loan to buy sewing machines and sewing supplies like fabric, thread and needles.  His dream is to enlarge the business and to install a workshop with industrial sewing machines.

loans.use: to buy sewing machines and sewing supplies like fabric, thread and needles.

loans.name: Mariela Armelis

texts.es:
Mariela de 43 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Isla trinitaria”. Una mujer muy trabajadora.
El negocio de ella es la venta de comida como: pescado frito, encebollado, tortilla.
Inicio está actividad desde que su esposo la abandono, además es empleada domésticas en una vivienda.
Tiene una hija de 16 años, estudia en colegio público.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de cemento, arena, pintura, para la construcción de su  vivienda.
Su sueño es arreglar su vivienda y que  su negocio siga progresando con la ayuda de Dios.
texts.en: Mariela, 43, lives in a suburban zone called “Isla Trinitaria.”  She’s a very hardworking woman.  Her business is selling food like fried fish, “encebollado” [Ecuadoran seafood stew] and tortilla [green plantain dumpling].  She started this business when her husband abandoned her.  In addition, she works as a domestic employee at a residence.  She has a 16-year-old daughter going to public school.  She requests the loan to buy cement, sand and paint to build her house.  Her dream is to fix up her house and that her business continues making progress with God’s help.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, paint, etc.

loans.name: Las Rosas Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Las Rosas”, lo conforman 17 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, pero principalmente los oficios de peluquería y costuras. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de La Serena.
Héctor integrante y secretario del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en el medio y fondo del grupo, él se dedica al corte y confección de ropa, desde hace 10 años. Comenta que aprendió de manera autodidacta. 
Hector confecciona y repara ropa, sus clientes cuando requieren sus servicios de confección van a su domicilio, el está disponible durante todos los días de la semana. Comenta que su clientela es fija y cuenta con un gran número de ellos. 
Sus materiales los compra en la ciudad de Santiago y los encarga por internet, por lo que sus insumos llegan por encomienda. Comenta que ésta dinámica de compra resulta más cómoda. Sus materiales los compra cada vez que necesita confeccionar alguna vestimenta. 
Con el crédito comprará género e hilos. 
Sus metas son tener un taller y adaptarlo en su propia casa. 
Hector vive junto a su madre, hermana y dos sobrinos. Sus sueños a nivel personal son prosperar en su negocio, para generar mejores ingresos y así brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. 
Sus motivaciones de continuar, se deben a los ingresos económicos que le brinda su negocio. 
El está muy contento y agradecido de los créditos y servicios otorgados por Fondo esperanza, comenta que la experiencia grupal le ha servido para compartir con mas personas. 
Las capacitaciones le han servido para aprender nuevas estrategias en la administración de su negocio. 
La Serena es una ciudad al norte de Chile, ubicada en la  Región de Coquimbo, provincia de Elqui. Es un importante sitio turístico, especialmente durante el verano, donde la gente va a visitar sus playas. La ciudad se dedica principalmente al sector de los servicios, habiendo varios bancos e instituciones financieras y una variada oferta gastronómica y hotelera. En las últimas décadas, el turismo se ha convertido en unas de las actividades económicas más importantes, además la ciudad es paso obligatorio de cientos de cruceros que arriban a la ciudad de Coquimbo, en donde en La Serena encuentran el lugar de residencia provisoria para visitar la zona y el Valle de Elqui.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Las Rosas” and has 17 entrepreneurs who are in a variety of businesses though mainly barber services and sewing.  All are from the city of La Serena.

Héctor is a member and Secretary of the communal bank.  In the photo he’s in the middle in the back of the group.  He has been making clothes for the last ten years.  He comments that he’s self-taught.  He makes and repairs clothes.  When his customers need his services they go to his house.   He’s available every day of the week.  He comments that his customers are regular and he has quite a few of them.

He buys his supplies in the city of Santiago or orders them on the Internet so his supplies are delivered to him.  He comments that this way of purchasing is more comfortable.  He buys supplies each time he needs to make a garment.  He will use the loan to buy fabric and thread.  His goal is to have a workshop set up at home.

Héctor lives with his mother, sister and two nephews.  His dream on a personal level is to make progress in business to generate better income and provide his family with a better quality of life.  His motivation to continue is the income he earns from his business.

He is very happy and grateful for the loans and services granted by Fondo Esperanza.  He comments that the group experience has allowed him to share more with other people.  The training has been useful to learn new business administration strategies.

La Serena is a city in north Chile located in the Coquimbo Region, Elqui Province.  It’s an important tourist center especially in summer when people come to visit the beaches.  The city is primarily service sector oriented; there are several banks and financial institutions and a varied cuisine and hotel sector.  During the last few decades tourism has become one of the most important economic activities.  The city is an obligatory stop for hundreds of cruise ships that arrive at the city of Coquimbo and people find temporary housing in La Serena for their trips to visit the zone and the Elqui Valley.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Francisco y su esposa la señora Alma Delia están solicitando un préstamo para terminar un cuarto de madera ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material que es (madera, clavos, cemento para el piso y pintura especial para la madera). Con el sueldo que recibe el Don Francisco de su trabajo en una fabrica, planea pagar el crédito, ya que Doña Alma Delia se en cargara de los gastos familiares con el ingreso que obtiene de su trabajo. 
Sus hijos están creciendo y necesitan privacidad y espacio en la casa. Desean mejorar su calidad de vida y la seguridad de ellos.
texts.en: Francisco and his wife Alma Delia are asking for a loan to finish a wooden room because they lack the money needed to buy materials (wood, nails and cement for the floor and special paint for the wood).  Francisco will use the salary he earns working in a factory to repay the loan since Alma Delia will take care of household expenses with the income she earns at her job.  Their children are growing and need privacy and space in the house.  They hope to improve their quality of life and their security.

loans.use: to fnish building a wooden room.

loans.name: Roca De Los Siglos Group

texts.es:
La señora Margarita es casada, tiene 46 años D. edad, no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar, tiene 7 hijos 2 D. los cuales estudian, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y ahora a la crianza D. animales, hasta ahora inicia este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica al comercio.

DeciD. organizar un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra D. animales domésticos consistentes en pollos D. engorD. y cerdos, espera en el futuro contar con muchos animales. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza D. animales y el resto a la elaboración D. canastillas D. plástico.
texts.en:
Margarita is 46, and married. She didn't have the opportunity to go to school,. She has seven children, two of whom go to school.  In addition to her  household chores, she now raises animals.  

She is just starting this work, and has the support of her husband who is a shopkeeper. She decided to organize a group in order to apply for a loan. She will use it to buy domestic animals, consisting of broiler chickens and pigs. 

She hopes to have a lot of animals in the future.  Some other members of the group raise animals, and the rest make plastic baskets.

loans.use: To buy chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Carolina Rosalia

texts.es:
Carolina de 37 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada  “Isla trinitaria”.
El negocio de ella es la venta de cosméticos como: perfumes, desodorantes, etc.
Ella inicio esta actividad con un capital bajo ya que sus vecinos la motivaron con esta actividad.
El horario de ella es de 8:00am hasta 4:00pm.
La dificultad de ella es el clima ya que es muy variado.
Tiene una hija de 14 años, estudia en colegio público.
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en el negocio y para la compra de mercadería como: cremas, maquillajes, sostenes.
El sueño de ella es mejorar su vivienda,  ya que su casa está construida a base de caña y cemento.
texts.en: Carolina, 37, lives in a suburban zone called “Isla Trinitaria.”  Her business is selling cosmetics like perfume, deodorants, etc.  She started this activity with little capital; her neighbors motivated her to go into this business.  Her work schedule is 8am to 4pm.  Her difficulty is the changeable weather.  She has a 14-year-old daughter going to public school.  She’s asking for the loan to invest in the business buying merchandise like creams, make-up and bras.  Her dream is to make some home improvements since her house is built from a base of sugar cane stalks and cement.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like creams, make-up and bras.

loans.name: Maria Cliselda

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Maria Cliselda le esta haciendo falta un cuarto.
Solicita un préstamo para empezar la construcción de una recamara ya que le esta haciendo falta para sus niños. Necesita compara el material que es (Cemento, varilla, block, arena y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora). 
Doña Maria Cliselda tiene poco tiempo que se quedo viuda y bajo su responsabilidad dos hijos, con una parte del sueldo que recibe de su trabajo en una  fábrica  en el ara de  jefa de línea de producción planean pagar el crédito. 
Desea mejorar la calidad de vida y que sus hijos tengan lo necesario para que sean personas profesionales, que tengan su propio espacio y privacidad en la casa.
texts.en:
María Cliselda’s house needs another bedroom room.  She’s asking for a loan to start building a bedroom she needs for her children.  She needs to buy the materials which are cement, rebar, concrete block and sand and to pay the person who will do the improvements).  

María Cliselda was widowed recently and left with two children in her care.  She will use part of her salary as a factory production line supervisor to repay the loan.  She wants to improve quality of life and that her children have what they need to become professional people and that they have their own space and privacy in the house.

loans.use: to start building a room in the front of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Ulaula

texts.en:
Ulaula, a 21-year-old single mother of two children, has been planting and harvesting taro for sale for two years. Now requesting a loan of WST $2700 to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxome, she plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2007, Ulaula joined SPBD to gain access to financial services, and this is her sixth loan. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.

loans.use: to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxome.

loans.name: Taimoe

texts.en:
Taimoe is 42 years old and is married with eight children. Taimoe owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has four years of experience in this business. Taimoe needs a loan of 1800 WST to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxone. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or $167 per week) to pay for her children's tuition fees.

In 2009, Taimoe joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Taimoe's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxone.

loans.name: Miriama

texts.en:
Miriama is 31 years old. She is married and has four children. Miriama owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has three years of experience in this business. Miriama needs a loan of 1750 WST to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxone. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 talas or $146 per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2009, Miriama joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Miriama's fourth loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxone.

loans.name: Sina

texts.en:
Sina is 41 years old. She is married and has five children. Sina owns and operates a business venture, selling fabric handicrafts to tourists and local community members. She has three years of experience in this business. Sina needs a loan of 2700 WST to purchase raw materials to make additional handicrafts. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 200 talas or $83 per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2009, Sina joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Sina's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to make additional handicrafts.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es: Israel de treinta y ocho años de edad vive con sus hijos, el posee una pupuseria y una venta de verduras y pollo, su negocio es muy conocido en la localidad y últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues vende unas pupusas exquisitas de sabor inigualable, además la verdura y el pollo que comercia son frescos y de muy buena calidad al igual que el servicio que les presta, siempre recibe a la clientela con una sonrisa en el rostro; Israel es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo y responsable con su familia, su secreto para el éxito radica en la constancia, dedicación y amor que se entrega a la labor,  el quiere llegar a encontrar ese éxito es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, frijol, queso, chicharrón, verduras, pollos y bebidas etc. Israel tienen la confianza que con su duro trabajo podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Israel is 38 years old and lives with his children. He makes and sells pupusas as well as vegetables and chicken. His business is very well known in the area and recently his customer base has grown considerably since he sells exquisite pupusas of incomparable flavor. What's more, the vegetables and chicken he sells are fresh and of very good quality, as is the service he provides. He always receives his customers with a smile on his face. Israel is a man dedicated to his work and responsible towards his family. His secret of success is rooted in the consistency, dedication and love that he devotes to his labor. He wants to be met with success, and so he seeks a loan from Integral which will allow him to purchase corn, beans, cheese, cracklings, vegetables, chickens, drinks, etc. Israel is confident that with his hard work he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cheese, cracklings, vegetables, chicken and drinks.

loans.name: Bendicion De Dios Group

texts.es: La señora Mercedes Patricia tiene 28 años de edad, tiene su negocio que es la venta de cosméticos. Considera un éxito en su vida el poder continuar con su negocio activo. Ella aduce no tener mucha competencia en su negocio ya que lo vende a personas conocidas que generalmente le encargan la mercadería. Desea empezar a trabajar con Vogue ya que actualmente solo trabaja con la empresa Avon. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de pintura de labios, lápiz labial, polvos, cremas, shampoo, tratamientos y cremas. Desea continuar invirtiendo en el negocio para continuar ayudando a su esposo en los gastos familiares para sacar adelante a sus hijos. Otra integrante de este grupo es doña Julia es casada y tiene dos hijos de 18 y 23 años de edad respectivamente. Ella solicita el crédito para invertirlo a su negocio que es la venta de cosméticos y los fines de semana elabora nacatamales. Su sueño es abrir una nueva línea de productos y establecerse en un lugar cercano al M., para poder vender sus productos.
texts.en:
Sra. Mercedes Patricia is 28 years old and has a business selling cosmetics. If she is able to continue an active business, then she considers this to be a success in life. Mercedes claims that she does not have much competition in her business since she sells to people she knows who generally order her merchandise. She wants to work with Vogue, but she currently works only with the Avon company.

Her loan will be used to buy lipsticks, lip pencils, powders, crèmes, shampoo, treatments, and lotions. She wants to continue investing in her business so that she can continue helping her husband with the family expenses in order for her children to get ahead.

The other member of this group is Doña Julia. She is married and has two children, ages 18 and 23 respectively. Julia is requesting a loan to invest in her business of selling cosmetics, but she also prepares Nicaraguan tamales on the weekends. Her dream is to start a new line of products and to establish a shop near the market where she can sell her products.

loans.use: to buy lipsticks, lip pencils, powders, crèmes, shampoo, treatments, and lotions.

loans.name: Leata

texts.en:
Leata is 40 years old. She is married and has no children. Leata owns and operates a business venture selling baked goods in the local community. She has three years of experience in this business. Leata needs a loan of 1000 WST to purchase sacks of flour, sacks of sugar and an oven. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or $125 per week) to improve and expand her business.

Leata joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Leata's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of flour, sacks of sugar and an oven.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José tiene 54 años, es casado y tiene 5 hijos, vive con su familia en Ambato en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador. Se describe como una persona amigable y le gusta confiar en las personas de su barrio.

José trabaja con su esposa e hijos en la crianza de borregos para posteriormente venderlos. Es el segundo crédito que le solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de crías de borrego para su crianza y cuando esten adultos para sacarlos a la venta; esta inversión le beneficia ya que crecerá su negocio y en un futuro podrá tener buenos ingresos para poder mantener a su familia.

Su sueño es poder convertirse en comerciante mayor de compra venta de animales.
texts.en:
José is 54 years old, married, and has five children. He lives with his family in Ambato, which is in the central mountains of Ecuador. He describes himself as a friendly person who likes trusting the people in his neighborhood.

José works with his wife and children raising sheep in order to sell them later. This is the second loan he has requested from FODEMI. The money will be invested in the purchase of lambs to raise. When the animals reach adult age, they can be sold. This investment will be a benefit because he will be able to grow his business and have more income in the future to support his family.

His dream is to become a wholesale animal merchant.

loans.use: to buy lambs.

loans.name: Feagai

texts.en:
Feagai is 43 years old. She is married and has three children. Feagai owns and operates a business venture selling baked goods in the local community.  She has three years of experience in this business. Feagai needs a loan of 1450 WST to purchase baking equipment, an oven, baking powder, sacks of flour and sacks of sugar. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 200 talas or $83 per week) to improve and expand her business.

Feagai joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Feagai's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase baking equipment, an oven, baking powder, sacks of flour and sacks of sugar.

loans.name: Blanca Jeanette

texts.es: Blanca Jeanette de cuarenta años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una venta de ropa para damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, de todo tipo y variedad, blusas, calcetines y artículos como carteras y otros accesorios, tiene mucha clientela pues sus productos son de muy buena calidad a precios bajos,  siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan; Blanca Jeanette es una mujer emprendedora siempre está dispuesta a trabajar duro para alanzar sus objetivos, su secreto para llegar al éxito es la perseverancia y el entusiasmo; está dispuesta a hacer crecer el negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar  blusas, pantalones, trajes, calcetines, carteras entre otros. Blanca Jeanette tiene fe que con su dedicación lograra llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Blanca Jeanette is 40 years old and lives with her life companion and their children. She has a business selling clothing of all types and varieties for women, men, boys, and girls. These include blouses, socks, and items such as handbags and other accessories. She has many customers because her products are of good quality and offered at low prices. In addition, she always has what people need. Blanca Jeanette is an enterprising woman who is always willing to work hard to achieve her goals. Her secret for success is having perseverance and enthusiasm.

She is willing to grow her business, so she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral to buy blouses, trousers, suits, socks, handbags, and other items. Blanca Jeanette has faith that her dedication will lead to financial security for her household.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers, suits, socks, handbags, and other items.

loans.name: Victor

texts.ru:
Виктор женат, имеет двоих детей. Он предлагает услуги по установке и ремонту сантехники в городе: меняет старые трубы, устанавливает системы отопления. Данные услуги имеют большой спрос. Доступные цены помогают Виктору завоевывать многих клиентов. Виктор находится в этом бизнесе уже 5 лет. Он – трудолюбивый и предприимчивый человек. Он также прекрасно общается с клиентами. Эти черты характера помогают Виктору иметь успех в своем бизнесе.

Виктор просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 20,000 гривен, чтобы приобрести инструменты и закупить материалы. Это предоставит ему возможность обслуживать больше клиентов и увеличить прибыль.
texts.en:
Victor is married and has two children. He provides services in installation and repair of plumbing equipment in the city: he changes old pipes and installs heating equipment. These services are in high demand. Affordable prices help Victor win over many customers. Victor has been in this business for five years now. He is a hardworking and entrepreneurial man. He also is fine in communicating with his customers. These personal qualities let Victor have success in his business.

Victor is asking to loan him 20,000 hrivna to buy tools and materials. This will allow him to service more customers and increase his profit.

loans.use: to buy tools and materials.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: Maria Mercedes es madre soltera con un hijo de 5 años a su cargo. Ella se dedica a la venta mercadería en general, desde hace mas de 4 años la necesidad de proveerle a su familia ingresos ha hecho que Maria salga adelante. Ella mujer muy trabajadora que se desempeña por lo que hace, además la mayoría de sus encargos los entrega personalmente para saber la opinión de sus clientes. Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos, shorts, trajes, cosméticos, calzado, bolsos, sabanas, prendas de oro laminado y plata.
texts.en:
Maria Mercedes is a single mother with a five-year-old son under her care. She has been selling general merchandise for more than four years. The need to provide for her family’s income has spurred Maria to move forward. She is a very hardworking woman who strives to achieve everything she can. Most of her orders are delivered personally so that she can get the opinions of her customers.

Maria is requesting a loan to invest in trousers, shirts, skirts, suits, shorts, dresses, cosmetics, shoes, bags, bed sheets, and gold and silver-plated jewelry.

loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, skirts, suits, shorts, dresses, cosmetics, shoes, bags, bed sheets, and gold and silver-plated jewelry.

loans.name: Tuleaga

texts.en:
Tuleaga is 38 years old. She is married and has three children. Tuleaga is starting a business venture selling meat products in the local community. Tuleaga needs a loan of 1000 WST to purchase additional meat to sell. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 150 talas or $63 per week) to improve and expand her business.

Tuleaga joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Tuleaga's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional meat to sell.

loans.name: Jerameel

texts.es: Jerameel de veintitrés años de edad vive con sus padres y hermanos, el posee una venta de pan ambulante y una pequeña tienda, su negocio principal es la venta de pan, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues el pan que comercia es de muy buena calidad, muy rico y con precio realmente accesible además el servicio es excelente,  Jerameel es un joven entusiasta con ganas de salir adelante siempre está con la mejor disposición de trabajar, para él la lucha diaria es la fuente de un futuro exitoso, quiere hacer crecer su negocio y es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pan dulce, y productos para surtir su tienda. Jerameel tiene la esperanza que así lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jerameel is 23 years old and lives with his parents and siblings. He sells bread as a street vendor and also manages a small store. His main business is selling bread. Jerameel has attracted many customers because the bread he sells is of good quality, very flavorful, and offered at a very affordable price. In addition, he provides excellent service. Jerameel is an enthusiastic young man who wants to get ahead and is always willing to work. He strives every day to have a successful future.

Jerameel wants to grow his business, so he is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to buy sweet bread and products to restock his store. He is hopeful that he will be able to provide his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sweet bread and products for his store.

loans.name: María Ermelinda

texts.es:
María tiene 30 años, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en Ambato que se encuentra en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador. Se describe como una persona trabajadora y le gusta aprender cosas nuevas que le van a servir para seguir adelante.

María trabaja con su hermana en la confección de pantalones de tela. Es el primer crédito que hace en Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la compra de tela e hilo, que servirán para confeccionar pantalones y de esta manera aumentará su producción y sus ventas mejorando sus ingresos económicos, que le ayudarán para poder darles el estudio a sus hijos.

Su sueño es compra más maquinas industriales para contratar personal y tener una gran empresa.
texts.en:
María is 30 years old. She lives with her husband and their two children in Ambato, which is located in the central mountains of Ecuador. María describes herself as a hardworking person who enjoys learning new things in order to get ahead.

María works with her sister making trousers out of fabric. This is her first loan with FODEMI, which she will use to buy fabric and thread for making trousers. This will enable her to increase her production and improve her sales. As a result, her income will improve so that she can provide for her children’s studies.

Her dream is to buy more industrial machines so that she can hire workers and have a successful enterprise.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread for making trousers.

loans.name: Balentina

texts.es: La Sra. Balentina, D. 50 años D. edad viuda hace mas D. 30 años, tiene 5 hijos que ya tienen sus vidas independientes, ya hicieron su familia, la Sra. Balentina vive en casa propia, se dedica a la venta D. abarrotes en una tienda D. barrio que tiene en su propio domicilio, ya lleva con esta actividad hace 10 años,  La clienta solicito un préstamo para financiamiento D. compra D. heladera y mercadería como dulces y galletas para surtir su tienda. La clienta agradeció a la institución por la rapidez que fueron atendidos y el buen trato que se le dio.
texts.en:
Sra. Balentina, age 50, has been a widow for more than 30 years. She has 5 children who already have independent lives and their own families. Sra. Balentina lives in her own home. She sells groceries at a neighborhood store located in her house. Balentina has been in business for 10 years.

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy frozen treats and merchandise, such as candies and cookies, to restock her store. Balentina is grateful to Emprender for the quick response and the good treatment she has received.

loans.use: to buy frozen treats, candies, and cookies.

loans.name: Fiapule

texts.en:
Fiapule, a 38-year-old married mother of three children, is starting a business venture selling cooked food to the local community. Fiapule needs a loan of WST $1800 to purchase plastic plates, a gallon of oil, a box of chicken leg quarters, mutton flaps and sausages. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 200 talas or US $83 per week) to improve/expand it.

Fiapule joined SPBD to gain access to financial services, and this will be her third loan. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral.

loans.use: to purchase plastic plates, a gallon of oil, a box of chicken leg quarters, mutton flaps and sausages.

loans.name: Josefa Maritza

texts.es: Doña Josefa Maritza es una mujer trabajadora y constante, ella es casada pero ya no tiene hijos que dependen de ella. Ella tiene su actividad que es la venta de carne desde hace más 22 años, ella está pidiendo un crédito para seguir invirtiendo en su actividad y comprar carne molida, hueso, carne de cerdo. Ella está muy contenta porque quiere salir adelante con su negocio, el sueño que tiene es comprar material para construcción realizarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Doña Josefa Maritza is a hardworking and persevering woman. She is married, but does not have children who are dependent on her. Josefa has been selling meat for more than 22 years.

She is requesting a loan so that she can continue investing in her business. Josefa will buy ground beef, bones, and pork. She is very pleased because she wants to move forward with her business. Her dream is to buy construction materials so that she can make improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy ground beef, bones, and pork.

loans.name: Lilly

texts.en:
Lily is 46 years old, widowed, and has four children. Lily owns and operates a business, providing clothing alteration and tailoring services to local community members.  She has been in this business for three years.  

Lily is requesting a loan for 2,700 WST, which she will use to purchase additional fabrics and materials.  She plans to use the profits from her business, estimated to be 300 talas or $125 per week, to improve and expand her business.

Lily joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Lily's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional fabrics and materials.

loans.name: David

texts.es: David tiene 30 años, es un joven emprendedor y muy trabajador, es soltero pero tiene una hija de seis años, quien no vive con él. Vive en casa de sus padres junto a ellos y algunas hermanas con quienes comparte los gastos y tratan de mejorar su calidad de vida día tras día. El trabajo de David consiste en el transporte de pasajeros, el sale todos los días muy temprano en busca de sus eventuales clientes para movilizarlos de un lugar a otro. Cuando tiene tiempo, va en busca de unos motores que necesitan reparación, pues los años en este trabajo le enseñaron a reparar motores, generádole así ganancias extras. Asimismo posee dos unidades de mototaxis, de los cuales uno lo maneja el y otro da a otro chofer que le paga como alquiler. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene la libertad de poder trabajar a la hora que mejor le conviene, ya que cuando hay algunos trabajos eventuales para la reparación de motores, él se da el tiempo para hacerlo. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará piezas para armar algunos motores y algunos repuestos para su moto que ya necesita mantenimiento mecánico.
texts.en:
David, age 30, is an enterprising and hardworking young man. He is single, but he has a six-year-old daughter who does not live with him. David lives at home with his parents and sisters. They share the expenses and try to improve their quality of life every day. His job consists of transporting passengers. He leaves early every day in search of customers that he can take from one place to another. When he has time, David will look for engines that are in need of repair. He spent many years learning how to repair motors, so this helps him to generate some extra income. David owns two motorcycle taxis, one that he operates and the other he rents out to another driver. What he likes about his job is the freedom to work at the time when it is most convenient for him. Whenever he has engine repair jobs lined up, he will set aside time to do the work.

This will be his first loan with MFP. He hopes to receive everyone’s support so that he can continue his work. With the amount he requested, David will buy some engines as well as a few spare parts for his motorcycle taxi since it is in need of maintenance.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his motorcycle taxi and a few engines that need to be repaired.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, propane gas, disposable products, and merchandise to restock her store.

loans.name: Aliitasi

texts.en:
Aliitasi is 38 years old. She is married and has three children. Aliitasi owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting fruits and vegetables for sale. She has 2 years of experience in this business.
   
Aliitasi needs a loan of 1,000 WST to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or US $125 per week) to improve and expand the business.

Aliitasi joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Aliitasi's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José de 54 años de edad, es soltero,  vive en su casa propia, la cual cuentan con servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Pacanga que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería.

Desde hace 5 años, cuenta con su propio negocio que lo a colocado en su mismo domicilio en donde ofrece a sus clientes todo lo que es productos de primera necesidad y golosinas. Cuenta con una clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus obligaciones personales.

José observa que su negocio va creciendo favorablemente desde un principio. Desea seguir ampliando su negocio con la compra de más mercadería como productos de consumo diario y golosinas.  Va a comprar sus productos en grandes cantidades lo que ayuda en bajar el precio que paga. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2,000 nuevos soles. José es muy trabajador y responsable, desea lograr mayores ingresos para tener un negocio más amplio y bien surtido.
texts.en:
José, 54, is single and lives in his own house that has electricity and running water, located in the Pacanga district, La Libertad department.  This is an agricultural and cattle raising area.

For the last 5 years he has had his own business in his house where he sells various staple goods and sweets.  He has a good customer base and the income is used to cover his personal expenses.
José has noticed that his business has grown well since the beginning.  He wishes to expand it by buying more staple merchandise and cookies.  He's going to purchase his products in big quantities to keep prices down.  That's why he decided to request a loan of 2000 new sols from Edpyme Alternativa.

 José is very hardworking and responsible and he wants to have more earnings to have a larger and better supplied business.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise such as basic staples and sweets to continue offering to his customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy thread, scissors, cloth, thimbles, needles, buttons, zippers and more.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: El señor Ricardo es transportista, es casado el  y su esposa la señora Elena tienen cuatro pequeños hijos y viven en casa propia en la zona de Valle de las Flores que esta ubicada a treinta minutos del centro de la ciudad, el sr. Ricardo tiene dos movilidades vagonetas, él trabaja con una de ellas en transporte público y la otra la entrega a un chofer quien también trabaja en transporte pero le entrega al sr. Ricardo renta diaria. El sr. Ricardo trabaja como chofer desde hace veintisiete años, comenzó a trabajar como asalariado y actualmente ya tiene sus dos movilidades,  su esposa Elena vende verduras, pero por el momento solo esta realizando labores de casa ya que hace poco tuvo su cuarto hijo. El sr. Ricardo es una persona muy responsable y puntual ya que en el tiempo que trabaja con préstamos de emprender demostró buena actitud y puntualidad en el pago de sus cuotas, en esta oportunidad solicita el préstamo de dinero para la compra de llantas y una radio de comunicaciones para una de sus movilidades.
texts.en:
Señor Ricardo works in transportation. He is married, and he and his wife, Señora Elena, have four little children. They live in their own house in the Valle de las Flores district, which is located thirty minutes from the center of the city.

Señor Ricardo has two vehicles. He works with one of them in public transport, and he turns the other over to a driver who also works in transportation but who pays Señor Ricardo a daily rent. Señor Ricardo has worked as a driver for twenty-seven years. He began working as an employee, and now he already has two vehicles. His wife Elena sells vegetables, but for the moment she is doing only housework since she recently had her fourth child. 

Señor Ricardo is a very responsible and punctual person, since in the time that he has been working with loans from Emprender he has shown a good attitude and has been punctual with his payments. At this time he is applying for a loan to purchase tires and a communications radio for one of his vehicles.

loans.use: to buy tires and a communication radio.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras De Corcona Group

texts.es:
L. Alcancía Comunal “Las Emprendedoras D. Corcona” es un Nuevo grupo conformado por 07 socios entusiastas que se comprometen desD. ahora  a trabajar bien con el Programa- Prosperidad.
Raquel tiene 21 años D. edad es conviviente y tiene 01 hijo. Anteriormente Raquel se dedicaba  a L. venta ambulatoria D. golosinas y confiterías, con el nacimiento D. su hijo tuvo que suspender sus actividades momentáneamente, pero con los deseos D. seguir trabajando y aportar con los gastos hogar empezó un nuevo negocio donD. lleva 8 meses dedicándose a L.  venta D.  productos D. belleza, L. cual trabaja sobre pedidos, negocio que le genera ganancias y le permite estar con su hijo. El deseo D. Raquel es D. instalar una tienda en su domicilio donD.  pueda trabajar sin descuidarse D. su pequeño. Con el crédito que solicito va a comprar algunos víveres para su hogar y  productos para su negocio como talco, colonias, cremas, entre otros y D. esta manera tener productos que pueda ofrecer a sus clientes. L. Nueva Alcancía Comunal “Las Emprendedoras D. Corcona” agradecen el crédito brindado. Sonia no pudo estar presente por motivo D. trabajo.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Emprendedoras D. Corcona" (The Entrepreneurs of Corcona) is a new group of seven enthusiastic members who promise henceforth to work well with the Prosperity Program.

Raquel is 21 years old and is in a common-law marriage, with one son. In the past Raquel worked as a walking vendor of candies and sweets. With the birth of her son, she had to suspend her activities briefly, but with a desire to continue working and contribute to the household expenses, she began a new business. For eight months she has worked in the sale of beauty products. She sells by taking orders, and the business generates earnings for her and allows her to be with her son. Raquel's wish is to set up a store in her house, where she can work without neglecting her little one. With the loan that she is applying for, she is going to buy some provisions for her home and products for her business, such as talcum, colognes, and creams, among other items, and in this way she will have products to offer her customers. 

The new communal bank "Las Emprendedoras do Corcona" is grateful for the credit being offered. Sonia could not be present for the picture because of work.

loans.use: to buy provisions and products such as talcum, colognes, and creams.

loans.name: Elena

texts.ru:
Елена замужем, имеет одну взрослую дочь. Она продает постельные принадлежности и нижнюю одежду. Для своего бизнеса Елена арендует место в тканевом магазине. Елена занимается этим бизнесом 11 лет.  Вежливое отношение к клиентам и умеренные цены помогают Елене завоевывать новых клиентов и удерживать повторных. Дочь Елены помогает своей маме в ее бизнесе – она закупает товар и подвозит его в магазин.

Елена просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 20,000 гривен на закупку товара. Она надеется расширить ассортимент и увеличить продажи. Получив дополнительную прибыль, Елена планирует потратить ее на улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Elena is married and has one adult daughter.  Elena sells bedding and undergarments.  She leases a space for her business at a fabrics store.  Elena has been involved in this business for 11 years.  Polite treatment of customers and moderate prices help Elena win more new customers and retain repeat ones.  Elena's daughter helps her mother with the business.  She buys the merchandise and delivers it to the store.  Elena is requesting a loan in the sum of 20,000 hryvnia to purchase merchandise.  She hopes to expand the assortment and increase sales.  Having gotten an additional profit, Elena plans to spend it to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to expand an assortment of merchandise

loans.name: Kinereta

texts.en:
Kinereta is 28 years old. She is married and has two children. Kinereta owns and operates a business venture selling fruits and vegetables to the local community. She has 2 years of experience in this business. 
 
Kinereta needs a loan of 1,000 WST to purchase additional seeds and a fence to replace the old one.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 200 talas or US $83 per week) to improve and expand her business.

Kinereta joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Kinereta's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds and a fence.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth tiene 39 años, es una mujer valiente y muy trabajadora, ella es madre soltera de dos hijos de once y seis años, vive en un casa alquilada junto a su hermano con quien comparten los gastos del hogar. Su trabajo  consiste en le venta al por menor de productos de primera necesidad, por tanto posee una tienda donde expende estos productos, asimismo vende helados, gaseosas, raspadillas, bebidas alcohólicas, hasta realiza recarga de línea para celulares. Su negocio es muy variado y es la más grade de la cuadra, y por tal es la más concurrida ya que los clientes encuentran de todo ahí. Este trabajo lo realiza sola, mientras sus hijos están en el colegio, pero cuando no tienen nada que hacer, la mayor la apoyan en la atención de la clientela. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo para poder realizar muchas actividades más, ya que vende algunos productos por catálogos en su tiempo libre. Le esta yendo bien y sus ganancias son buenas, espera poder ampliar mas adelante su negocio. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Esta muy agradecida con la institución ya que le dan la oportunidad de poder crecer con su inversión. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería para abastecer su tienda, pues le esta faltando arroz, azúcar, verduras y algunos otros productos que si compra en cantidad gasta menos en pasaje y le dan a un menor costo.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 39 years old. She is a brave and hard working woman. Elizabeth is a single mother of two children, aged 11 and 6. She lives in a rented house with her brother who splits the expenses with her. Her works consists of the retail sale of essentials, therefore she has a store where she sells these products, as well as ice cream, soft drinks, snow cones, and alcoholic beverages; she even sells minutes for prepaid cellphones. Her business is very varied and is the largest on the block; for this reason, it’s the most popular store because customers find everything there.

She works alone, while her children are in school, but when they don’t have anything to do, her oldest daughter helps her wait on customers. What she likes most about her work is that she has time to do many other things, as she also sells some products via catalog in her free time. Things are going well and her income is good. She hopes to expand her business farther. This will be her second loan with MFP, therefore, she hopes for the support of each one of you. She is very pleased with MFP since with their investment, they give her the opportunity to be able to grow. With the amount requested, she will buy merchandise to stock her store, because she needs rice, sugar, vegetables and some other items. If she buys these in bulk, she will spend less on transportation and will be given a better price.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, vegetables and other canned goods.

loans.name: La Beneficencia 1 & 2 Group

texts.es:
Sinelia es una D. los miembros del Grupo La Beneficencia 1 & 2 y está ubicado en la ciudad D. San Pedro D. Macorís, en unas D. las comunidades D. más escasos recursos, donD. la mayoría D. los habitantes son inmigrantes haitianos, que vinieron a la Republica Dominicana, con la finalidad D. mejorar su calidad D. vida.

Sinelia tiene un puesto D. ventas D. frutas, verduras, vegetales y pollo, el cual lo opera desD. su casa,  una vivienda muy modesta que comparte con sus 3 hijos y su actual pareja. Sinelia tiene ya varios años viviendo en el país, desD. que emigro a Republica Dominicana, desD. entonces se ha esforzado por salir adelante, ha realizado diversos negocios y actualmente está recibiendo su noveno préstamo en Esperanza, logrando pagar e invertir sus préstamos anteriores, para expandir y hacer crecer su negocio. 

Piensa invertir este préstamo en la compra D. vegetales, varios quintales D. pollo y frutas. También planea restaurar su puesto D. venta. Unos D. sus sueños es poder vivir cómodamente, y que nunca le falte nada, ni a ella ni a su familia, piensa lograrlo por medio D. su negocio, realizando sabias inversiones D. sus beneficios y D. los prestamos. Sinelia agradece a todos ustedes por su apoyo.
texts.en:
Sinelia is one of the members of the group named "La Beneficiencia 1 & 2". It is located in the city of San Pedro D. Macoris. It is one of the poorest communities where the majority of the inhabitants are Haitian immigrants who came to the Dominican Republic with the goal of improving the quality of their life.

Sinelia has a fruits, vegetables, legumes, and poultry stand which she operates from her house. It is a modest home that she shares with her 3 children and her current partner. Sinelia has been living in the country for several years, ever since she emigrated to the Dominican Republic. Since then she has struggled to move forward. She has taken up various businesses and currently she is currently in receipt of her ninth loan with Esperanza (Kiva Field Partner). She has managed to repay and invest her previous loans. She expanded and increased her business.

She plans on investing this loan in the purchase of vegetables, as well as various quintals of poultry and fruit. She also plans on restoring her sales stand. One of her dreams is to live comfortably, that neither she nor her family will be in want of anything. She plans on achieving this through her business, by making wise investments with her benefits and her loans. Sinelia is thankful to all of you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, fruits, and poultry.

loans.name: Marivel Mirian

texts.es: La señora Marivel tiene la actividad de peinadora ya hace bastante tiempo,  tiene un local  en la zona de Villa Fátima donde a ella le va muy bien porque tiene muchos clientes por el buen servicio que brinda, ella antes era solo peinadora empleada, pero ya con la experiencia que tenia decidió abrir su propio salón de belleza, su esposo es radiotécnico el negocio del esposo no es estable porque a veces tiene contratos y a veces no, la señora desde muy joven estudio para ser peinadora y por suerte ella esta haciendo lo que mas le gusta que es el peinado, sus hijos son niños que están estudiando en nivel primario, el crédito será invertido en el adelanto de su alquiler para el local de su salón de belleza, es una persona dinámica con ganas de superación su deseo es el de mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en: Marivel has been a hairdresser for some time, and has a shop in the Villa Fátima region. She does well there because she has many customers who appreciate her quality service. Before, she was just an employee, but now with her experience she has decided to open her own beauty salon. Her husband is a radio engineer, and his business is not stable because sometimes he has a contract, and sometimes he does not. Marivel has studied to be a hairdresser since she was very young, and, luckily, she is doing what she likes most, hair styling. Her sons are studying in first grade. The loan will be invested in advance rent payments for her beauty salon. Marivel is a dynamic person with desires to get ahead. Her wish is to improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: To invest in advance rent payments.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es: Catalina,de 40 años de edad,y tiene 6 hijos,ella se dedica a la venta de ropa variada para caballeros y damas,como playeras,pantalones,etc ella lleba 10 años de dedicarse a esta actividad,y poco a poco se ha superado en su negocio,ella nos cuenta que esta muy contenta porque sus clientes han aumentado considerablemente,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa variada ya que sus clientes le piden otros diseños y no alcanza surtirles,el sueño de ella es tener un puesto mas grande y darles lo mejor a sus hijos,para que en un futuro tengan mejores oportunidades.ella espera que la fundacion le pueda ayudar con el credito que ella esta solicitando.
texts.en:
Catalina, 40, has 6 children and works selling clothing for men and women like t shirts, pants, etc. She has 10 years of experience doing this and little by little has overcome challenges in her business. She tells us that she is very happy because her customers have increased considerably. 

She is asking for this loan to buy varied clothing because her customers are asking for other designs and she can't supply them. Her dream is to have a bigger stall and to give the best to her children so that in the future they have better opportunities. She hopes that the foundation can help her with the loan she is requesting.

loans.use: to buy varied clothing to sell.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia de 41 años, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, la misma que cuenta con servicio sólo de luz , ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.   En la cual los pobladores desarrollan la actividad agrícola,  ganadera y artesana.

Julia se dedica a la compra y venta de pescado fresco el mismo que vende que sale a vender por todas las calles de la zona donde vive su puesto, actividad que realiza desde hace 4 años, es conocida porque el producto que ofrece es fresco, cuenta con su propia clientela, con la venta de su producto le ayudará a solventar sus gastos diarios de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para comprar más pescado fresco para seguir ofreciendoles a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ingresos para poder pagar su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Julia desea que su negocio crezca cada y pueda contar con un puesto de venta en el mercado de la zona, deseo que lo logrará con esfuerzo y trabajo, con la única finalidad de poderles brindar mejores estudios a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Julia, who is 41 years old, lives with her husband and children in their own home. Their home, which only has electric service, is located in the rural region of the Tambogrande district in the Department of Piura. The inhabitants of this region make a living through agriculture, ranching, and handicrafts.

Julia buys and sells fresh fish. Not only does she sell fish from her little shop, but she also goes out and sells fish throughout the streets in the region where she lives. She has been working this way for four years, and is well-known because the product she offers is fresh. She has her own customer base, and her product sales help her to cover her family’s daily living expenses.

She has requested a loan of 1000 PEN [$375] to purchase more fresh fish and be able to continue offering it to her customers, which will allow her to increase her revenue to be able to repay the loan and improve her quality of life. Julie wishes that her business will grow every day and that she will be able to rely on a sales place in the region’s market. She plans to achieve these wishes through hard work and effort, with the ultimate goal of being able to provide her children with a better education.

loans.use: To purchase more fresh fish to be able to continue offering it to her customers.

loans.name: Isaul Antonio

texts.es:
Don Isaul tiene la edad de 34 años, casado, padre de un hijo, de cinco años, contando con el apoyo de su esposa ya que labora como cajera. El trabajo de Isaul es como cadete, de taxi, con cinco años de experiencia, con dias buenos, en donde abordan mucho pasajero, y otros que solo saca el recorrido de la gasolina.
Su objetivo es la construccion de un cuarto de concreto, ya que actualmente su pequeña casa es de zinc, y con muchas dificultades en los tiempos llovioso, y que quiere poder ofrecer mejor vivienda a su familia.
Comenzara la construccion de un cuarto pequeño, en donde comprara cinco perlines, cinco laminas de zinc, cemento, hierro, bloques, para comenzar la obra, y que gracias al financiamiento en Afodenic se esta haciendo posible.
texts.en:
Isaul is thirty-four years old and married. He has a five year old child and is supported by his wife who works as a cashier. Isaul works as a taxi driver, and has five years of experience. Some days, when many passengers get in, are better than others when he only covers his fuel costs.
His goal is to build a room out of concrete, since currently his little house is made of zinc, which gives him lots of trouble when it rains, and he would like to be able to offer his family a better home.
Thanks to AFodenic financing, to begin the work he will purchase five beams, five sheets of zinc, cement, rebar, and blocks, and he will begin to build a small room,

loans.use: To begin building a room out of concrete to improve the condition of his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy lime, corn, a griddle, bags, napkins, and other products.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Maria Elena, de 21 años ella se dedica a la venta de ropa variada para Dama,caballeros,y niños, ella se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 5 Años,nos cuenta que esta contenta porque apesar de las adversidades a podido salir adelante, y sus ventas aumentan dia a dia,a pesar de su corta edad piensa poner un local mas grande para surtir mejor a sus clientes,y ofrecerles mas variedad en estilos y asi de la misma manera seguir vendiendo y ayudar a su familia,el sueño de ella es ayudar a sus hermanos a que estudien y tengan su propio negocio,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa por mayor y surtir un poco mas su local,en estilos y tamaños.
texts.en:
Maria Elena is 21, and sells a variety of women's, men's and children's clothing. She has been in this business for five years. She tells us that she's happy, because in spite of hardships, she has been able to move forward in her life. 

Her sales increase day by day, and in spite of her young age, she is thinking of setting up a larger shop.  This will enable her to better supply her customers, and offer them more variety in styles, so that she can continue selling and helping her family. Her dream is to help her siblings continue their education, and have their own business.

She is applying for this loan to buy clothing at wholesale, and stock her shop with a few more styles and sizes.

loans.use: To buy a variety of clothing for sale.

loans.name: Ruben Javier

texts.es: El sr. Rubén se dedica a la venta de ropa de niños  hace mas de tres años que se dedica a este negocio, el cual fue heredado por parte de su hermana mayor quien ya no se dedica a este negocio, el sr. En un gran esfuerzo se abrió mercado viajando a Santa Cruz y Oruro para abastecerse de mercadería, a la fecha cuenta con mas de 50 clientes fijos a los cuales les deja a crédito las prendas al por mayor, vende por las mañanas en las ferias desde la madrugada hasta media mañana como mayorista, el sr. Se esforzó mucho para alcanzar su patrimonio y agradece a emprender por haberle brindado el apoyo que necesito en su debido momento y lo sigue haciendo. El señor vive en casa familiar, es soltero pero piensa en un futuro formar su familia, con el dinero del crédito comprara ropa por mayor ya que tiene que entregar un pedido.
texts.en:
Sr. Rubén sells children’s clothing and has been in this business for more than three years. He inherited this business from his older sister because she no longer wanted to continue. With great effort, he established a new market by traveling to Santa Cruz and Oruro where he is able to restock his merchandise. To date, he has more than 50 established customers who are extended credit for buying clothing at wholesale. Rubén sells at the fairs as a wholesaler from dawn until noon. He has worked hard to build up his assets and is grateful to Emprender for providing the support for his current and future needs.

Rubén lives at the home of a relative. He is single, but plans to start a family in the future. The money from this loan will be used to buy clothing in bulk since he has an order that he needs to fulfill.

loans.use: to buy children's clothing in bundles.

loans.name: Progresar Al Futuro (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
Las integrantes del banco comunal Progresar al Futuro viven en el sector nor-oriental de la provincia del Azuay en el cantón Paute (Cuenca), donde su gente es laboriosa y emprendedora, han sabido afrontar los desafíos, adaptarse a los cambios e innovar para liderar nuevas líneas de producción. Cuenta con gastronomía típica y gran variedad de platos. Las ferias de domingo son llenas de color por la vestimenta de su gente y por la variedad de productos que se venden. La producción frutícola es parte de la gran oferta de Paute, como la producción de flores que hacen de este cantón un verdadero jardín, se cultiva para exportación rosas de la más alta calidad y una gran variedad. Cuenta con varios miradores que facilitan vistas panorámicas del centro cantonal y sus alrededores.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Señora Rosa Elena, es socia del banco comunal Progresar al Futuro, vive por una comunidad del cantón Paute, tiene 35 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 18, 16, 14, 12 y 10 años de edad, su primera hija es casada e independiente, dos estudian en el colegio y dos en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora como albañil, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su mamá con quien comparte los gastos del hogar.

Doña Rosa Elena se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar, y como pasa en casa tambien cría cuyes los cuales vende, otra de sus ocupaciones es la agricultura pero lo que produce es solo para su consumo.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por una amiga, su crédito lo va a invertir para comprar materiales de construcción para terminar su casa.

Por esta ocasión nos acompañan en la foto del grupo cuatro niños que son hijos de algunas de las socias. Un bebé que esta en brazos de su mamá, un niño que esta sentado con un pañuelo en la cabeza, un niño que esta parado en la segunda fila con chompa gris y una niña que esta parada atráz con una chompa café.
texts.en:
The members of the Communal Bank “Progresar al Futuro” (Progress Toward the Future) live in the northeastern section of Azuay Province in the canton of Paute (Cuenca). The people who live there are hardworking, enterprising, and know how to confront challenges, adapt to change, and find new and innovative methods of production. This area offers traditional cuisine and a wide variety of dishes. At the Sunday fairs, people wear colorful outfits and sell a wide variety of products. The canton of Paute is truly known as a garden because of its fruit and flower production. A wide variety of high-quality roses are grown for export. There are several locations that provide panoramic views of the canton and the surrounding areas.

One of the members of this group is Sra. Rosa Elena. She is a member of the Communal Bank “Progresar al Futuro” and lives in a community within the canton of Paute. Rosa is 35 years old, married, and has five children (ages 18, 16, 14, 12, and 10). Her oldest daughter is married and independent. Two other children are in high school and the remaining two attend a smaller school in town. Her husband works as a bricklayer. Rosa’s family does not own a home, so they live at her mother’s house and share in the household expenses.

Doña Rosa Elena takes care of the household chores, but she also spends time raising guinea pigs to sell. She also devotes some time to farming, but what she produces is only for consumption by her family.

This is her first loan with the Communal Bank after having been invited by a friend. Her loan will be invested in construction materials so that she can finish her house.

On this occasion, four children are included in the photo since they are related to some of the members. There is a baby in the arms of her mother, a little boy who is seated with a bandana on his head, another boy on the second row with a gray sweatshirt, and a young girl standing at the back wearing a coffee-colored sweater.

loans.use: to buy materials for finishing the construction of her house.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Antonio; el tiene 66 años de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de autos, el socio vende en forma independiente desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere mejorar el negocio de venta de autos. El  socio solicita el préstamo para mantenimientos de los carros para comprar repuestos.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Antonio is a member of the Communal Bank “Valle Sagrado de Calca” (Sacred Valley of Calca) which is located in the District and Province of Calca, Department of Cusco.

He is 66 years old, married, and has four children. Antonio divides his time between his daily activities and his business of buying and selling cars. He works independently from 9am to 5pm. This business enables him to help his children get ahead. Antonio wants to improve his business of selling cars, so he is requesting a loan to buy spare parts in order to maintain the cars that he sells.

He is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for maintaining the cars that he sells.

loans.name: Marvin Andres

texts.es: El señor Marvin Andrés es casado junto a su esposa tienen 3 hijos menores de edad. Su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general, tiene más de 4 años en este negocio  pues sabe muy bien que ha sido difícil el mantener a su familia sin obtener un trabajo estable. Desde muy joven le ha gustado  este medio de vida pues siempre esta preocupándose por mejorar cada día más en el servicio con sus clientes. El solicita el crédito para la compra de cremas, tratamientos, perfumes, calzado, bolsos, entre otros. Está muy feliz porque con el crédito otorgado ya podrá obtener los productos que necesita.
texts.en:
Sr. Marvin Andrés is married and lives with his wife and three young children. He has been selling general merchandise for more than four years. Marvin knows very well that it is difficult support a family without having a stable job. Since he was a young man, Marvin has enjoyed working in this manner because he is always concerned about improving each day the service he provides to his customers.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy crèmes, treatments, perfumes, shoes, handbags, and other items. He is very happy with the loan he has received because he will be able to obtain the products that he needs.

loans.use: to buy crèmes, treatments, perfumes, shoes, handbags, and other items.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”PEROLNIYOC”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Narcisa; La socia tiene 47 años de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 27,25, 23, 17 años de edad; la socia trabaja atendiendo su tienda de abarrotes y también es agricultora, la socia tiene terrenos de cultivo de maíz, ella compra también de sus vecinas maíz y los vende todo al por mayor.  La socia se dedica a ambos negocios desde hace 10 años aproximadamente, la socia requiere invertir su préstamo en la compra de maíz para la venta ella acopiara o almacenara los productos para ofrecer a sus diferentes clientes y venderlos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de maíz al por mayor.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Sra. Narcisa is a member of the Communal Bank “Perolniyoc” which is located in the District and Province of Urubamba, Department of Cusco.

She is 47 years old, married, and has four children (ages 27, 25, 23, and 17). Narcisa manages a grocery store, but she is also a farmer. She has land on which she grows corn, but she also buys corn from her neighbors and then sells it in bulk. Narcisa has managed both businesses for approximately 10 years. She needs a loan in order to buy corn in bulk that she can sell to the collection centers and the stores which in turn offer this product to different customers. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to use for this purpose.

Narcisa is grateful for this loan and promises to complete her payments according to the stated terms.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: La señora Maria , es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe , es soltera , no tiene hijos a su cargos , ya todos son casados e independientes , los planes futuros hacia su vivienda es poder  realizar un pequeño anexo para montar su negocio de comidas rápidas ; ya que donde ella vende actualmente es alquilado , doña Maria desde hace varios años se dedica al comercio anteriormente alquilaba sillas y mesas pero no le funciono ; ahora cuenta con el negocio de comida rápidas , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es que no cuanta con  el recurso económico para poder  brindarle variedad de comida , como pollo rostizados , helados ,entre otra cosas. El financiamiento lo quiere para incrementar el inventario del negocio. Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de fondo Kiva ya que sin ellos pequeños comerciante como ella no podrían echar andar mas allá su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria is a resident of the town of Ticuantepe. She is single and has no dependents since all of her children are married and live on their own. Her future plans for her home include building a small annex where she can establish her fast food business. She currently rents the place where she sells. Doña has been a merchant for several years. She previously rented out tables and chairs, but that business did not succeed, so now she sells fast food. The greatest impact on her business is not having the financial resources to provide a variety of food, such as roasted chicken, ice cream, and other items.

The loan she is requesting will increase her business inventory. She is grateful for the support that AFODENIC has provided by offering Kiva funds, because without them, small businesspeople like her would not be able to go very far.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, candy, sodas, and other items.

loans.name: Toribio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Toribio; el tiene 72 años de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de plásticos como baldes, tinas, sillas entre otros plásticos, el socio vende en el mercado de Calca desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de productos de plásticos. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar baldes, tinas y sillas al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Toribio is a member of the Communal Bank “Valle Sagrado de Calca” (Sacred Valley of Calca) which is located in the District and Province of Calca, Department of Cusco.

He is 72 years old, married, and has four children. Toribio divides his time between his daily activities and his business of selling plastic goods such as buckets, basins, chairs, and other items. He sells at the market in Calca from 9am to 5pm. Toribio wants to expand and improve his business of selling plastic goods, so he is requesting a loan to buy buckets, basins, and chairs in bulk.

He is happy with the loan and promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to buy plastic buckets, basins, and chairs in bulk.

loans.name: Wilfredo Antonio

texts.es: El señor Wilfredo se dedica a brindar el servicio de enderezado y pintado de vehículos. Hace más de 8 que se dedica a este negocio, el tiene a personas que le ayudan a realizar este trabajo a pesar de que últimamente no ha sido fácil, pues las constantes lluvias ocasionan que Wilfredo no pueda trabajar porque con este clima la pintura no se seca bien. El motivo de su crédito es para la compra aerosoles, pinturas, herramientas entre otros productos. Vive en casa propia desea realizarle modificaciones para dejársela a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sr. Wilfredo provides auto body repair and paint services. He has been in this business for more than eight years. Wilfredo has employees who help with the work. However, things have not been easy lately because of the constant rains. On occasion, Wilfredo is not able to work because the paint does not dry well in this type of weather.

This loan will be used to buy sprayers, paints, tools, and other supplies. Wilfredo lives in his own home, but he wants to make modifications so that he can leave it to his children.

loans.use: to buy sprayers, paints, tools, and other supplies.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es: El señor Esteban es un hombre muy trabajador que desde hace como 20 años adquirió un terreno al cual fue construyendo poco a poco 2 cuartos para comenzar a vivir el y su familia. En este momento el se ve en la necesidad de construir un cuarto mas, por que son 6 de familia, 4 hijos mas Esteban y su esposa por lo que el espacio esta mu y reducido para la casa en la que viven. Esteban quiere ofrecer a sus hijos un mejor patrimonio, comodidad y estabilidad económica por tal motivo trabaja como chofer en el municipio para poder cubrir los gastos. El cuarto que quiere comenzar ya lo había planeada pero por un y otro gasto no lo ha podido realizar por eso pide el apoyo para comprar cemento, arena, block, varilla y pagar mano de obra y de esta manera el tendrá mayor espacio.
texts.en:
Sr. Esteban is a hardworking gentleman. Twenty years ago, he acquired a piece of land on which he gradually built two rooms where he and his family could start living. At the moment, he needs to build another room because there are six people in his family, which includes four children plus Esteban and his wife. There is very little space in the house where all of them can live.

Esteban wants to offer his children a better inheritance in addition to comfort and financial stability. For this reason, he works as a chauffeur in town in order to cover the expenses. The room that he wants to start building has already been planned out, but he is not able to cover other expenses. Therefore, he needs assistance with buying cement, sand, blocks, lumber, as well as pay for labor so that he can have more space.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for building another room.

loans.name: Elizabeth Kristhel

texts.es: La señora Elizabeth  se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza hace tres años que se dedica a esta actividad, ella vende de forma ambulante, llevando y ofreciendo sus productos a distintas instituciones publicas y privadas donde ya tiene clientela y muchos clientes ya realizan sus pedidos, ella deja los productos al contado como también a crédito, también  reparte por su zona es una persona muy emprendedora y lucha por salir adelante,  vive por la zona de Pasanqueri es muy buena  cliente, trabajadora y muy responsable, ella es casada pero su esposo esta de viaje, con el dinero del crédito comprara cosméticos al por mayor y productos que se encuentran en promoción, y así podrá ofrecer a un precio mas alto y obtener mas ganancias,   La Sra. Elizabeth se encuentra agradecida por la confianza y el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Elizabeth has been selling cosmetics for three years. She sells door-to-door carrying and selling her products at various locations, public and private, where she has built up a clientele. Some of her clients also place orders. She also sells her products on credit. She is a self-starter, and she struggles to get ahead. She lives in an area of Pasanqueri with many good hard-working clients. She is married, but her husband travels. With the loan she will purchase cosmetics at wholesale prices and products that are on sale, so that she can increase her profits. Mrs. Elizabeth is thankful for the trust and support offered.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics at wholesale prices

loans.name: Migdalia

texts.es:
La señora Migdalia se dedica al transporte escolar de esta misma ciudad desde hace 12 años, trasladando a los estudiantes de primaria y  desde su casa hacia la escuela que se encuentra en Estados Unidos y viceversa. El trabajo que tiene Migdalia es de suma importancia ya que es mucha responsabilidad trabajar con niños de diferentes edades ya que los traslada desde esta frontera hacia los EUA ya que son niños ciudadanos que viven aquí y estudian allá para una mejor Educación adecuada para ellos que son de ese país..
En este momento el camión donde transporta a los niños necesita mantenimiento por eso quiere un préstamo para comprar las partes que necesita y pagar al mecánico que le hará el trabajo. Migdalia desea tener su unidad en mejores condiciones para ofrecer a los niños mejor servicio y los padres mayor seguridad. De esta manera se prevendrá de tener un accidente a causa de un problema técnico. Para Migdala es muy importante tener el transporte en buenas condiciones por que su fuente de ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Migdalia has been running a school transportation service for 12 years, transferring elementary school children from their homes to the school in the United States and vice versa.  Migdalia's work is very important because she has a lot of responsibility transporting children of different ages from the border to the USA, since the students live here but study there to receive a better education.

The van she uses for student transportation is in need of maintenance and therefore she is requesting a loan to buy repair parts and pay the mechanic to do the work.  Migdalia wants to have a vehicle in optimum condition to give the children the best service possible and insure the parents know it is safe.  This is to prevent any kind of accident that could arise from a technical problem.  Migdalia feels it is very important to maintain the vehicle because it is her source of income to help her husband cover  expenses.

loans.use: To buy auto repair parts for maintenance.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.es: Lilia tiene 58 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos de los cuales dos ya son mayores e independientes, solo vive con uno de ellos que aun depende de ella. Juntos habitan en su casa propia.
