Su trabajo consiste en la venta de bebidas alcohólicas a personas mayores de edad, tiene una fuente de soda en su casa en donde lo utiliza para vender gaseosas y bebidas para el consumo de personas mayores de edad. Tiene cinco años realizando esta actividad y lo hace con su hijo quien le ayuda en todo lo que puede. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene trabajo e ingresos todos los días, además tiene tiempo para realizar múltiples actividades, le esta yendo regular ya que las ventas bajaron por falta de variedad de productos, por ello espera aumentar la variedad y así volver a tener los ingresos que tenía antes. Este será el crédito número doce con MFP, y por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más bebidas para su venta, además que quiere aprovechar las promociones que cuando compra en mayor cantidad le dan a menor precio.
texts.en: Lilia, 58, is a cheerful, hard-working lady who has a common-law husband and three children.  Her two oldest are grown and live independently and the youngest one still lives at home with the family which has its own house.  Her work consists of selling alcoholic beverages to adults.  She has a soda fountain in her house and sells sodas and alcohol to adults.  She has been in business for five years and her son helps out when he can.  What she enjoys most about her work is that she is busy and earns an income every day.  She also has time to carry out other activities.  Sales have dropped a bit for lack of product variety but she wants to add products and get back to the income she was earning previously.  This is her twelfth loan through MFP and she is counting on support from each of you.  She plans to use the loan to buy more beverages and take advantage of the discounts offered for volume purchases.

loans.use: To buy beverages.

loans.name: Wiliam Fernando

texts.es:
Don William sigue trabajando como conductor, lleva años, ejercitando su profesion, sus dos hijos siguen cursando el año escolar.
Como objetivo ha sido la mejora de su casa, el cual va poco a poco, haciendo la mejora, con el credito anterior logro hacer un pequeño muro de piedra, mejorando la condicion de su propiedad, y mejor seguridad para su familia.
Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento sera para cambio de techo e instalar porton de hierro en la puerta de alfondo,el cual esta contento por que cada dia sigue con el mejoramiento de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Mr. William has been working as a driver for several years.  He has two school-aged children.  Little by little he has been carrying out home improvements and with a previous loan was able to put up a small stone wall to improve the property and insure family safety.

This new loan will be used to change the roof and put in an iron back door.  He is happy to see his home improving on a daily basis.

loans.use: To change part of the roof and buy an .

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to grow and sell flowers.

loans.name: La Beneficencia 4 & 5 Group

texts.es:
Elizabeth  es madre de 3 hijos, los cuales ha criado junto a su pareja y padre de sus hijos; todos aun viven en su humilde vivienda, en una comunidad rural a las afueras de San Pedro de Macorís, cuya población está conformada por habitantes haitianos, quienes emigraron buscando una mejor estabilidad económica. Elizabeth trabaja con la finalidad de ayudar a su familia a salir adelante, educar a sus hijos y poder darles un mejor futuro. 

Elizabeth se ha dedicado a la venta de calzado, desde hace varios años, este es su octavo préstamo con Esperanza Internacional, y ha sido miembro de su grupo desde hace 4 años. Elizabeth está planificando comprar zapatos, sandalias, tenis, para hombres, mujeres y niños. Junto a los demás miembros de su grupo, llamado la Beneficencia 4 & 5, han generado nuevas actividades de negocio para su comunidad, dedicándose a la venta de cosméticos, productos comestibles, ropas, salones de belleza, entre otras.

Unos de sus sueños es tener su propia casa y ahorros suficientes. Los beneficios de su negocio planea re-invertirlo y así poder hacer crecer su negocio, aumentando sus ventas y su clientela.
texts.en:
Elizabeth has three children.  She has raised them together with her life partner, the father of their children.  They all still live in her humble house.  They live in a rural community in the outskirts of San Pedro de Macorís.  Its inhabitants are comprised of Haitians who emigrated looking for improved financial stability.

The reason that Elizabeth works is to help get her family ahead, to educate her children, and to be able to give them a better future.  Elizabeth has been selling shoes for several years.

This is her eighth loan with Esperanza Internacional.  She has been a member of her group for four years.  Elizabeth is planning to buy men’s, women’s, and children’s shoes, sandals, and tennis shoes.

Together with the other members of the group called Beneficencia 4 & 5, they have generated new business activities for their community by selling cosmetics, food products, and clothes, and by having beauty salons, among other businesses.

One of her dreams is to have her own house and sufficient savings.  She plans to reinvest the profits from her business in order to be able to make her business grow by increasing her sales and her customers.

loans.use: to buy different types of shoes.

loans.name: Emprendiendo Sin Fin Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Emprendiendo Sin Fin”, lo conforman 22 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran confitería, repostería, amasandería, venta de ropa interior y mascotas. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Temuco.
Marta integrante del Banco comunal quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en primera fila ocupando el segundo lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste un pantalón color azul y una polera rayada, se dedica al rubro de la repostería, desde hace 5 años. Ella realizó algunos cursos de repostería impartidos por la Municipalidad e instituciones de solidaridad.
Comenta que le ha ido muy bien con la venta de sus productos y conserva clientela antigua. Sus productos los realiza en su casa y los reparte en los domicilios de sus clientes fijos. Su mercadería la compra en la ciudad de Temuco. Su cocina está implementada por una cocina a gas, microondas y una batidora. 
Actualmente se dedica a la preparación y venta de postres, por lo que con el crédito comprará envases de plástico, cucharas de plástico, vasos y leche. 
Sus metas en su negocio son prosperar y surgir económicamente. 
Marta vive junto a sus padres y sus sueños a nivel personal son ahorrar para postular a una vivienda propia. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios y créditos otorgados por Fondo esperanza, ya que le permitirán invertir en su negocio y organizarlo. 
Respecto al grupo del banco comunal comenta que ya se conocían con los demás integrantes y la relación ha sido muy buena. 
Temuco es la capital de la región de la Araucanía. La ciudad se ubica a 670 kilómetros al sur de Santiago (capital de Chile). En sus alrededores se ubican una serie de balnearios lacustres (Pucón, Villarrica) y una flora y fauna nativa muy llamativas, concentrada en parques naturales cercanos. Cabe destacar que en esta región habita el 50% de los mapuches, pueblo indígena, existente en nuestro país.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "Emprendiendo Sin Fin" (Endless Enterprise), and is comprised of 22 entrepreneurs who are involved in different activities such as bakery and sweets products,  underwear sales and pets.  They all live in the city of Temuco.

Marta is a member of the communal bank and is pictured sitting in the first row second from the right.  She is wearing blue jeans and a striped sweater.  She has been making bakery products for five years and has taken several bakery classes offered by the municipality and support institutions.

Product sales have been going well and she has many customers.  She makes her products at home and delivers them to a fixed customer base.  She buys her ingredients in the city of Temuco.  Her kitchen has a gas stove, microwave and mixer.

Currently she makes and sells desserts and wants to use the loan to buy plastic containers, plastic spoons, cups and milk.  Her goal is for her business to prosper and become successful economically.

Marta lives with her parents and her personal goals are to save enough money to buy her own house.  She is very happy and grateful for the services and loans received from Fondo Esperanza, which have enabled her to invest in and organize her business.

Regarding the communal bank she says she already knew the other members and the relationship has been a good one.  Temuco is the capital of the Araucanía region.  The city is located 670 kilometers south of Santiago (capital of Chile).  There are several lake spas (Pucón, Villarrica) in the area and colorful flora and fauna in the nearby natural parks.  Around 50% of the Chilean Mapuche indians live here.

loans.use: To buy plastic containers, spoons, cups and milk.

loans.name: Martha Ofelia

texts.es: La señora Martha Ofelia es una mujer muy trabajadora y muy responsable, desde hace 20 años trabaja como enfermera en una clínica del gobierno brindado servicio a variedad de pacientes. En este momento Martha Ofelia se ve en la necesidad de solicitar el apoyo para comprar una cama de hospital ya que tiene un familiar muy cercano enfermo que cada semana se tiene que hacer hemodiálisis, por lo que necesita tener un cuarto acondicionado para este tipo de enfermedad, como Martha no tiene el suficiente dinero para comprar este tipo de mueble por que son caros, solicita el préstamo para comprarlo y de esta manera le brindara a su familiar una mejor calidad de vida y mejor confort.
texts.en: Martha Ofelia is a very hard-working and very responsible woman.  She has been working as a nurse in a government hospital for twenty years, providing service to a range of patients.  Right now, Martha Ofelia needs to request support to buy a hospital bed as she has a very close family member who is sick.  Every week they have to undergo hemodialysis and so they need a room which is properly equipped for this type of illness.  Martha doesn't have enough money to buy this piece of furniture, as it it is expensive, so she is requesting a loan to buy it.  This will enable her to provide her family member with a better quality of life and more comfort.

loans.use: to buy a hospital bed

loans.name: Noel Alexander

texts.es:
El señor Noel tiene 27  años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y una hija.

Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 13 años, cultivando maíz, fríjol, plátano y hortalizas. Su padre fue quien le enseño, ya que desde muy pequeño lo llevaba a trabajar con él. Y eso le ha servido para hoy en día ganarse la vida y darle lo necesario a su familia.  

Don Noel necesita de insumos, para que sus cultivos puedan desarrollarse, por lo que debe desplazarse durante cuarenta y cinco minutos en autobús, para comprarlos. Él esta  solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar fertilizantes y abono, con esto les dará mantenimiento a tiempo a sus cultivos y hasta el cultivo de plátano, ya que quiere aumentar el área de la huerta de plátano, debido a que es muy rentable. De esta forma él podrá obtener una mayor producción y por ende mayores ingresos, ya que don Noel desea ofrecerles mejores oportunidades a su hija, para que se supere académicamente, ya que él solo pudo terminar sus estudios de la primaria.
texts.en:
Noel is 27 years old and lives with his life partner and daughter.

Noel has been farming for 13 years.  He grows corn, beans, bananas and vegetables.  His father taught him this business as he would take him to work with him from a very young age.  This has helped him to earn a living and provide for his family.

Noel needs supplies so that his crops can develop.  He must travel 45 minutes by bus to buy his supplies.  He is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to buy fertilizers and manure which will enable him to provide timely care for his crops and bananas.  He would like to increase the size of his banana farm as it is very profitable.  In this way, Noel will be able to obtain a better production and, thereby, more income.  Noel would like to provide his daughter with better opportunities so that she does well academically as he himself only managed to finish elementary school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and manure for his crops

loans.name: Maria Auxiladora

texts.es: Maria Auxiliadora tiene 67 de años. Ella con el crédito va comprar los materiales para realizar las prendas de vestir que le ha  solicitado como zipper, botones, telas, agujas, tijeras, dedales entre otros productos. Ella cuenta con algunas comodidades necesarias en su hogar. Ella quiere brindarles a sus clientes la mejor calidad tanto en la elaboración de sus prendas de vestir pues cada día obtiene más clientes. Empieza su labor desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, a pesar de que algunas veces tiene dificultades como es la salud pero esto no la detiene a seguir adelante con este medio de vida.
texts.en: Maria Auxiliadora is 67 years old.  She will use her loan to buy the materials she needs to make clothes that people have ordered from her.  She will buy zips, buttons, fabric, needles, scissors, thimbles and other products.  She has some necessary conveniences in her home.  She would like to provide her customers with the best quality she can when making her garments.  She has more and more customers every day.  Maria starts work at 8 o'clock in the morning and works until 6 o'clock in the evening.  She sometimes has health problems but this does not stop her from getting ahead in her work.

loans.use: to buy zips, buttons, fabric, needles, scissors, thimbles and other products

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es: El señor Esteban tiene un taller de costura donde elabora deportivos los que vende en la localidad de Yacuiva  y también lleva al Brasil, el Sr. Esteban comenzó desde muy pequeño a trabajar en el área y ahorrando poco a poco logro equipar su taller de costura y como en todo negocio este tiene su estacionalidad en el año de acuerdo a temporada, a su vez el sr. esteban tiene clientes fijos para que de esta manera su taller siga en actividad, cabe destacar que al taller se le aumento una maquina bordadora computarizada, demostrando así, el crecimiento del taller, con el dinero del crédito comprara tela por cantidad, le va muy bien en su negocio pero su deseo es poder confeccionar muchas mas prendas de vestir y poder contratar nano de obra y brindar oportunidad a otros jóvenes que aprendan del oficio, es una persona joven con muchas ganas de superarse se encuentra agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Esteban has a sewing workshop where he makes sweatsuits which he sells at a locale in Yacuiva. He also takes them to Brazil. Esteban started when he was very young, working in the area and saving. Little by little, he was able to set up his sewing workshop. As in all businesses, it has its seasons of high demand during the year. Esteban also has regular customers that keep his workshop busy. It is worth noting that he added to his workshop with a computerized bordering machine. With it, he is demonstrating his workshop's growth. With the money from the loan, he will buy fabric in large quantities. It is going very well in his business but he wants to make more types of clothing and be able to hire workers and offer opportunities to other young people who can learn the trade. He is a young person who really wants to get ahead and is grateful to the institution for the support it has offered.

loans.use: to buy rolls of fabric.

loans.name: Zoila Dolores

texts.es:
La Señora. Zoila es socia del banco comunal La Merced, vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana (Cuenca), este lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades. Mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Zoila tiene 33 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos  de 10 y 8 años de edad que están estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora conduciendo su camioneta realizando fletes, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de familiares.

La Señora. Zoila labora hace 15 años en una panadería, allí trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta el momento que termine de realizar sus tareas. Ella tiene hace 4 años  una tienda de comestibles, para la cual contrato una empleada que le paga un sueldo mensual, su tienda está abierta  desde 6 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por una vecina,  el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad  para surtir su tienda.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Zoila is a member of the La Merced communal bank. She lives in the parish of Santa Ana (Cuenca). This place has a cold climate and its people raise animals and farm. Many work in the city in different activities. It maintains its culture and traditions in its small towns.

Zoila is 33 years old. She is married and has had 2 children from that marriage, aged 10 and 8. They go to a school in town. Her husband works as a driver and carries freight in his pickup truck. They do not have a house of their own and live in the home of relatives. 

Zoila has worked for 15 years in a bread bakery. She works there fron Mondays through Fridays from 8 in the morning until she finishes her tasks. For four years she has had a small grocery store and she pays an employee a monthly salary to work there. Her store is open from 6 in the morning until 9 at night.

This is her first loan with the communal bank and she was invited to join by a neighbor. She will invest the money from the loan in basic necessity products to stock her store.
 
Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy basic necessity products.

loans.name: José Felipe Santiago

texts.es:
El señor Felipe tiene 26  años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y un hijo.

Él se dedica a la crianza de cerdos desde hace 13 años, sus padres fueron los que le enseñaron esta actividad, de la venta de los cerdos Felipe recibe los ingresos para sostenimiento su familia.

Cada quince días el viaja aun tiangue, para comprar un cerdo pequeño, para esto el tiene que caminar a pie durante treinta minutos hasta un desvió, en donde aborda un autobús que tarda cuarenta y cinco minutos en llegar al tiangue (lugar donde se comercializa con animales). Él regresa a su casa con el cerdo caminando a pie por diez kilómetros aproximadamente desde el tiangue hasta su casa. Luego él se encarga de engordarlos hasta que los vende a un mejor precio.

Don Felipe esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar dos cerditos y comprar concentrado para alimentarlos. De esta forma aumentara el numero cerdos y tendrá alimento para poderlos vender y aumentar sus ingresos, ya que este negocio le es rentable y podrá brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Él planea ahorrar de sus ingresos, para construirle a su familia una casa de adobe, ya que actualmente viven en una casa de bajareque.
texts.en:
Felipe is 26 years of age and lives with his life companion and one son. 

For 13 years, he has worked raising pigs.  His parents were the ones who taught him this trade.  From the sale of the pigs, Felipe receives income to support his family.

Every fifteen days he travels to the livestock market to purchase a small pig.  To do this, he has to walk thirty minutes to a bus stop, where he boards a bus which takes forty-five minutes to arrive to the livestock market (the place where the animals are bought and sold).  He returns home with the pig walking approximately ten kilometers from the market to his house.  Then, he takes charge of fattening the pigs until he can sell them at a better price.

Felipe is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo, in order to purchase two piglets and concentrated feed to nourish them.  In this way, he will increase the number of pigs and will have feed to enable him to sell them and increase his income.  Since this business is profitable, he will be able to offer a better quality of life to his family.

He plans to save his income, in order to build his family an adobe house, since they currently they live in a cane house.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and food to fatten them.

loans.name: Laura María

texts.es:
La Señora. Laura es socia del banco comunal La Merced, vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana (Cuenca), este lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades. Mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Laura tiene 36 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos  de 15, 11, 8 y 5 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y sus tres hijos menores en la escuela. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad.

Doña Laura hace 5 años labora en una tienda de comestibles que es de su propiedad, la cual atiende desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche y de domingo a domingo.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 4 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad  para surtir su negocio.
 
Su meta es poner una panadería.
texts.en:
Señora Laura is a member of the communal bank La Merced. She lives in the parish of Santa Ana (Cuenca) which has a cold climate. The people there breed livestock and farm. Many work in the city in different activities. They maintain the culture and traditions of their towns.

Señora Laura is 36 years old. She is married and has 4 children: 15, 11, 8 and 5 years of age. The eldest child studies at college and the 3 younger ones at school. Her husband is self-employed. The house they live in is their own property.

Doña Laura has worked for the past 5 years in her own grocery store which she takes care of from 6 in the morning until 9 at night, from Sunday to Sunday.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 4 years and she is going to invest her new loan in the purchase of staple products to stock her business.

Her goal is to set up a bakery.

loans.use: to buy staple products.

loans.name: Layla Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Layla es madre de tres hijos, tiene la edad de 40 años, hoy en dia cuenta con dos trabajos para apoyarse economicamente, labora como docente en un preescolar y elabora piñatas en donde por largos años ha venido trabajando. Sus tres hijos estan estudiando, y espera que se formen en la educacion para un porvenir mejor.
Ella ha venido mejorando su casa de concreto, aun falta mucho por hacer, ya que todo esta caro y va trabajando por parte, con este nuevo financiamiento hara el baño, y la compra de un inodoro, tubos para las aguas negras, y poder lograr una higiene mejor, cada mejora la esta haciendo con los prestamos en Afodenic, y asi poder equilibrar los gastos basicos del hogar, gastos escolares, gastos personales. Medicina. Contenta por que atraves de las dificultades, esta saliendo adelante con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña Layla is the mother of 3 children. She is 40 years old and works 2 jobs in order to support herself. She works as a teacher in preschool and makes piñatas, something she has been doing for many years now. Her 3 children study and she hopes that they will have a good education so as to have a better future.

She has been improving her concrete house but still has a lot to do as everything is expensive and she is doing it a little at a time. With this new loan she is going to build the bathroom, buy a toilet and sewage pipes to have better hygene. She is making each improvement with the loans from Afodenic and in this way she can balance the basic household expenses, school fees, personal expenses and medicine. She is happy that despite diffiuclties she is moving ahead with her children.

loans.use: to build a bathroom and buy a toilet and sewage pipes.

loans.name: René Otoniel

texts.es:
René tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero y vive con sus padres. René se dedica a prestar servicios de publicidad por micrófono en distintos establecimientos en la ciudad.

René ha solicitado un préstamo a Fundación Campo para la compra de materiales para la instalación de energía eléctrica en su casa. Con lo que él gana actualmente, René no ha podido reunir todo el dinero que necesita de una sola vez. El préstamo le ayudará a comprar todo lo necesario al mismo tiempo, y así él podra ir pagando poco a poco con la ayuda de su padre y su hermano. René quiere colocar energía eléctrica en su casa para que su familia no tenga que respirar los gases tóxicos que emite el candil que usan para alumbrar.

En un futuro René sueña con construir una casa digna para su familia. Actualmente viven en una casa con paredes hechas con pléstico negro (similar a una bolsa de basura), y el piso es de tierra. Con mucho esfuerzo René ha podido comprar un pequeño terreno. El sueña con ser un ejemplo para toda su familia.
texts.en:
René is 23 years old, single and lives with his parents. René works as an in-house promoter at several establishments in the city. 

René has asked Fundacion Campo for a loan to buy the building materials necessary to install electricity in his house. With what he currently earns, René has not been able to save all the money needed to buy everything at one go. The loan will help him buy everything he needs at the same time. In this way he can pay off the loan little by little with the help of his father and brother. René wants to install electricty in his house so that the family does not have to breathe in the toxic fumes of the lamp they use for lighting. 
 
In the future, René dreams of building a house worthy of his family. They currently live in a house with walls made of black plastic (similar to black plastic garbage bags) and a dirt floor. With a lot of hard work, René has been able to buy a small piece of land. He dreams of being an example to the whole family.

loans.use: to buy the building materials necessary to install electricity in his house.

loans.name: Lita

texts.es: Lita tiene 48 años, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos de los cuales tres son mayores e independientes, y solo tiene un niño de 7 años viviendo con ella en su casa propia. El trabajo de Lita consiste en la compra al por mayor de bebidas, para después venderlos al menudeo y ganando un porcentaje por cada venta. Ella realiza este trabajo por más de cinco años, y ahora cuenta con una fuente de soda pequeña en su casa, siendo su principal medio de ingresos para su hogar. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo para hacer algunas otras cosas más, le va bien ya que tiene clientes en su cuadra y buscan siempre bebidas heladas. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera que le vaya bien como le fue la primera vez, además se mostró como socia muy responsable. Con el monto solicitado, comprará bebidas al por mayor para poder tener mayor variedad que ofrecer a sus fieles clientes.
texts.en: Lita is 48 years old and a single mother of 4 children, 3 of which are adults and independent and only 1, a boy who 7 years old, lives with her in her own house. Lita's work involves the bulk purchase of drinks which she later sells retail to earn a percentage of each sale. She has been doing this work for more than 5 years and now has a small soda fountain in her house which is her major source of income for the household. What she likes about her work is that it gives her time to do a few other things. She is doing well as she has customers in her block who are always looking for cold drinks. This will be her second loan with MFP and so she hopes to do as well as with the first one, as she also demonstrated herself to be a responsible member. With the requested amount, she will buy drinks in bulk in order to be able to offer her loyal customers more variety.

loans.use: to buy beverages.

loans.name: Francisco Gabriel

texts.es: Francisco Gabriel  es un padre de dos hijos pequeños de 12 y 9 años. Vive junto a su esposa e hijos él se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva, desde hace más de 9 años. Inicio este negocio junto a su esposa que lo apoyo para que empezara con pocos productos, actualmente cuenta con una gran variedad de clientes que le solicitan variedad. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes entre otros.  El tiene planes de incrementar su mercadería y aumentar su inventario, como todo buen padre su más grande anhelo es poder ver a sus hijos profesionales y sobre todo dar una mejor calidad de vida a toda su familia.
texts.en: Francisco Gabriel is the father of 2 small children aged 12 and 9 years. He lives with his wife and children. He has been selling new clothes for more than 9 years. He started the business with his wife who supported him so that he could start off selling with a few products. He currently has a wide variety of customers that askk for variety. The reason for the loan is to purchase trousers, shirts, skirts, dresses and more. He has plans to increase his merchandise and his inventory. Like any good father, his greatest dream is to see his children become professionals and above all else be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, skirts, dresses and more.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 42 años, es casado y tiene un hijo de 10 años, vive con su familia en Ambato. Se describe como una persona tranquila que le gusta trabajar en el campo.

Manuel trabaja con su esposa en la crianza y venta de borregos. Es el segundo crédito que solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que será invertido en la compra de crías de borregos para su crianza y posteriormente para su venta lo cual le ayudará a incrementar la cantidad de animales y podrá mejorar sus ventas e ingresos, lo que le ayudaría para seguir dando el estudio a su hijo.

Su sueño es comprar un terreno para poder dar de pastar a sus animales ya que al momento arrienda terrenos para poder dar de comer a los borregos.
texts.en:
Manuel, 42, is married with one child, age 10, and lives with his family in Ambato.  He describes himself as a peaceful person who likes to work in the field.

Manuel works with his wife raising and selling sheep.  This is the second loan he has requested from FODEMI.  He will use it to buy litters of lambs to raise and then sell.  This will help him to increase the quantity of his animals and he will he able to improve his sales and earnings, which will help him to continue giving his son the opportunity to study.

His dream is to buy a piece of land to be able to graze his animals, since at the moment he rents land to be able to feed his sheep.

loans.use: to buy litters of lambs for fattening.

loans.name: Fanny Carmen

texts.es:
La Señora. Fanny es socia del banco comunal La Merced, vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana (Cuenca), este lugar  es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad en diferentes actividades. Mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Fanny tiene 30 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 13 y 5 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y su segundo hijo en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora conduciendo su propio transporte pesado, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de familiares.
La Señora. Fanny se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar, y al cuidado de sus hijos, como pasa en casa cría animales como: cerdos, pollos y cuyes.
 
Se encuentra en su cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal, el cual lo va a invertir en la compra de llantas para el vehículo pesado de su esposo, para que él pueda seguir con su negocio.
 
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Fanny is a member of the La Merced communal bank.  She lives by the Santa Ana (Cuenca) parish.  This place has a cold climate, and its people devote themselves to raising animals and farming.  Many people work in the city in different business activities.   The people maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.

Fanny, age 30, is married and has two children, ages 13 and 5.  Her oldest child attends high school, and her second child goes to a school in the city.  Her husband is a driver, and he works driving his own heavy transport vehicle.  They do not have their own home, so they live in their relatives’ house.

Fanny devotes herself to the household chores and taking care of her children.  As she is at home, she raises animals like pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs.

This is her fourth loan in the communal bank.  She will use it to buy tires for her husband’s heavy transport vehicle.  She will do this so that he will be able to continue with his business.

Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Leslie

texts.en:
Leslie has 17 years of experience working as a psychotherapist in New York City. Six years ago, she transformed her therapy practitioner experience into a business by creating Trance4mation Games, LLC. Leslie’s primary occupation is counseling but she enjoys creating therapeutic, interactive games that help people. The first game she created, called "Keep It Real Game", cultivates team building for youth by asking questions that each player answers within the group.

In 2010, Leslie started developing a new project. It’s an interactive card game that helps soldiers returning from war better integrate into society. Leslie has invested a lot of her income and time into the development of the new card game, Warrior Spirit Game. She now has a large order for the Warrior Spirit Game and needs to stock up inventory for upcoming events where she will be selling the product.

With this loan, Leslie will pay for the production of the game in order to increase inventory.

Check out the new Warrior Spirit Game here:
http://www.missionhomefront.com

loans.use: To pay for the production of her new game.

loans.name: Ellen

texts.en:
In October 2008, Ellen was one of many to be laid off at her company. She decided that she wanted pursue something that she would enjoy and incorporate that with her love for animals. Ellen researched online and determined that incorporating dogs into a business would be a natural fit for her.

Ellen got her first dog, Trace, knowing that she would train him to become a mold and bed bug detection dog. On the bed bug detection front, she and Trace have a contract with Orkin and she earns a base salary as well as separate referrals. On the mold detection front, Ellen gets her own cases through personal ads and word of mouth. She and Trace only provide mold detection services on the weekends because Trace needs frequent breaks. Trace can only work 4 hours at a time with a minimum 5-hour break, so Ellen has to teach her second dog, Mason, to detect mold. 

Ellen found Mason at a local shelter and he was due to be euthanized in the next couple of hours. Both of the dogs come from shelters, so she feels good about taking “society’s throw-away dogs” and giving them a job to perform. She says it is important to have two dogs to work interchangeably so they can have breaks in between. Both Trace and Mason are a big part of Ellen’s family, and have the love and attention of four teenagers.

This loan from Accion USA will enable Ellen to have her second dog trained for detection services. This will help Ellen expand her business by being able to use both dogs for mold detection.

loans.use: To have her dog trained for mold detection services.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Ten years ago, when Paul was a student at the University of Michigan, he came up with an idea for a board game. The game is similar to chess, but more advanced and with a military theme. Knowing that it was a creative idea, Paul took the project to a major gaming company which rejected his concept. After being rejected, Paul put the game and ideas aside and forgot about it all until a few years ago. Today, he is working to make “Commander in Chief” one of the most popular household games. He has jumped many hurdles to get the game where it is, and it has had some great successes. Paul gave copies of the game to military groups and military bases then donated a portion of each sale to the Armed Services YMCA.

Paul recognizes that he did not anticipate the challenges that he would face in starting his own business for the game, including business plans, trademarks and financing. The costs to create the game were extensive, and to start meant hiring lawyers for patenting, graphic designers to help design the game, and raw materials for manufacturing. While several investors were interested in funding "Commander in Chief", Paul turned them down knowing that he didn’t want to split up his company. That being said, he was ineligible for a traditional bank loan and was directed to Accion USA.

Paul will use the loan to purchase raw materials to manufacture the game, as its demand is growing. "Commander in Chief" can be found as a product of Sears, and is being sold at The American History Museum of the Smithsonian. 

Check out the website here:

http://www.commander-in-chief.com/

loans.use: To purchase raw materials for production of the board game.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco tiene 54 años vive con su esposa y cinco hijos en Ambato que está ubicado en la Sierra centro del Ecuador. Francisco es una persona trabajadora, que le gusta sacar adelante a su familia con su esfuerzo y no está deacuerdo con la injusticia.

Francisco trabaja con su esposa e hijos en la crianza de borregos para venderlos en las ferias de animales. Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito a Fodemi, el mismo que va a a ser utilizado en la compra de crías de borregos y alimentación para los mismos, con el objetivo que estos crezcan saludables y sean competentes al momento de venderlos. Este crédito ayudará a Francisco a mejorar sus ingresos y así podrá darles el estudio a sus hijos.

Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Francisco, age 54, lives with his wife and five children.  They live in Ambato, which is located in the central mountain range of Ecuador.  Francisco is a hard-working person.  He likes to get his family ahead with his work.  He is not in agreement with the miscarriage of justice.

Francisco works with his wife and children raising sheep to sell at the animal fairs.

This is the first time he has requested a loan from Fodemi.  The loan will be used to buy lambs and their feed.  His objective is for the lambs to grow and be healthy, and that they are fit when it is time to sell them.

This loan will help Francisco improve his income.  This way he will be able to give his children an education.

His dream is to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy lambs.

loans.name: Tania

texts.en:
Originally from Cuba, Tania came to the United States in search of better opportunities. She dreamed of becoming a self-sufficient entrepreneur and leaving a legacy for her children and family. In 2006, Tania and her husband started a janitorial services company. Since then, they have purchased a franchise and contracts with different organizations. The contracts have allowed Tania to grow the business through referrals and the opportunity to provide cleaning services to a wide variety of companies. Tania’s business, Tanilan Services, has been able to hire two employees while continuing to expand. In the beginning, Tania faced the biggest challenge of not being able to find financing to grow her business.

This is Tania’s second loan with Accion USA. She will use this loan to expand the franchise and purchase more contracts which will bring in more income.

“This will allow us to reach out to a wider community, increase our presence, and spread the word about Tanilan Services.”

loans.use: To purchase more contracts for cleaning services.

loans.name: Dyanne

texts.en:
Dyanne started her housekeeping business two years ago. After working for cleaning businesses and making very little money, she decided to open her own business cleaning houses. Dyanne works for herself, which means fewer hours and much more money. Her biggest challenge was to start the business with no income in the first few weeks and having a small clientele base.

Dyanne will use this loan from Accion USA to purchase cleaning supplies and some informal contracts. She hopes this will help her to continue expanding the business and make it formal in the future.

loans.use: To purchase cleaning supplies and informal contracts.

loans.name: Eugene

texts.en:
Eugene decided to start his own business because he always wanted to be an independent entrepreneur. He opened his business, Jas Foliage, four years ago. Jas Foliage is a plant nursery operated out of Eugene’s home. They grow special plants for gardens used for indoor landscaping. He works with his wife in their backyard where he has low cost of production and great return from his handy work.

 Jas Foliage not only nurses different species of indoor plants but also provides indoor landscaping services. The business is facing the slow season and Eugene is worried about how he will pay his bills. He wants to get a head start on increasing production from December to May. 

Eugene is using the loan to purchase plants, soil, pots, garden equipment and office supplies. He will also use this loan to develop his credit a little more.

loans.use: To buy plants, soil, pots, garden equipment and office supplies.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
A year and a half ago, Catherine was out of work and faced a lot of financial trouble. She decided to take a huge risk and use all of her savings to open up a daycare. She went from being unemployed to being a successful entrepreneur. She currently watches eight children from two to six years old. Two of the children are after school, but Catherine is able to charge the same for their care. There are also kids that don’t come in daily, but Catherine watches them occasionally. She is waiting for a new license which will allow her to have 16 children in her daycare at one time; five are currently on a waiting list. 

Catherine has been spending more money each month to enlarge her daycare space which allowed her to qualify for the license. Her husband is acting as her assistant and will help her with the larger group of children.

Catherine is using this loan to buy additional chairs, tables, mats, paint supplies and other materials needed for the larger daycare center.

loans.use: To pay for chairs, tables, mats, and supplies for her daycare.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Emma

texts.es:
Emma tiene 52 años, es una mujer amable, alegre y muy responsable, esta separada de su esposo, pero es madre de dos hijos de 27 quien ya es independiente y de 19 años quien vive en Lima estudiando y que depende aún de ella. Ella vive en su casa propia junto a sus sobrinas a quienes le renta habitaciones. El trabajo de Emma consiste en la venta de frutas y verduras regionales, entre las frutas que vente están el aguaje, guabas, cocona, guanábana, anona, camu camu, y otros más así como los tomates regionales, el culantro y el ají dulce regional. Ella posee un stand en el mercado número 2 de su ciudad, y tiene 42 años trabajando en este mercado. 
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que se puede dar el tiempo de trabajar, divertirse con sus amistades en el mercado y generar ingresos a su hogar, además trabaja con las personas de forma directa y eso le gusta, estar en contacto con la gente, le esta yendo bien ya que tiene sus caseritos a quienes se ganó durante tanto años de trabajo, espera poder seguir trabajando de esta manera en su puesto y tiene como proyecto el de arreglar mejor su casa para poner una quinta y empezar a vivir de las rentas que le produciría. Este será el décimo crédito  con MFP, hasta ahora le esta yendo bien, gracias a los prestamos recibidos anteriormente y por tal espera contar nuevamente con su apoyo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más frutas y verduras para seguir con la venta de su productos y ofrecer mayor variedad de los mismos a sus diferentes y fieles clientes.
texts.en:
Emma is 52 years old. She is a friendly, cheerful and responsible woman who is separated from her husband. However, she is a mother of 2 children. One is 27 years old and independent. The other is 19 years old, living and studying in Lima and still dependent on her. She lives in her own house with her nieces to whom she rents out rooms. Emma works selling regional fruit and vegetables, including coral palm, guavas, peach tomatoes, soursop, custard apple, camu camu and more such as the regional tomatoes, cilantro and sweet chillies. She has a stand at the number 2 city market and she  has been working here for 42 years. 

What she likes about her work is that she can take the time to work, have fun with her friends in the market and generate an income for her household as well as work directly with people and be in touch with them, something she likes doing. She is doing well as she has her customers acquired over so many years of work. She hopes to continue working this way at her stand and has in mind a project to improve her house so as to set up a guest house and start living from the income that that would generate. This will be her 10th loan with MFP. So far she is doing well thanks to the loans received earlier and so she hopes to be able to count on your support again. With the amount requested, she will buy more fruit and vegetables to continue selling her produce and offering a greater variety to her different and loyal customers.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and vegetables to stock her business.

loans.name: Walter Antonio

texts.es: Walter tiene 23 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Desde hace mas de 5 años que tiene este negocio, tiene una gran demanda de parte de sus clientes que le solicitan variedad como es pintura de labios, polvos, cremas, sabanas, calzado, bolsos entre otros como todo padre responsable tiene que sacar adelante a su hijo de 5 años. El crédito lo utilizara para la compra de materia prima en estos momentos tiene una gran cantidad de pedidos.
texts.en:
Walter, age 23, sells general merchandise.  He has had this business for over five years.  There is a great demand from his customers.  They request a variety of items like lipstick, powder, cream, sheets, shoes, and purses, among others.  

Like all responsible fathers, he has to get his five year old child ahead.

He will use the loan to buy merchandise for these times when he has a great number of orders.

loans.use: to buy  lipstick, powder, cream, sheets, shoes, and purses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal

loans.name: Diana Elisa

texts.es: La señora Diana  , es una pequeña comerciante del municipio de Ticuantepe , ella habita junto a su esposo e hijas , el esposo labora en una empresa privada para apoyarle con los gatos del hogar , los planes futuros hacia su vivienda es poder construirla de bloques , ya que con los financiamientos anteriores logro  agrandar su negocio de frutas y verduras lo cual las ganancias le permitieron pagar en  tiempo y forma y ahorra para comprar su propio terreno donde actualmente habita , ella se siente muy contenta con el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de los Kiva ya sin ellos no hubiese realizado el sueños de poseer su propia vivienda .Con el financiamiento quiero comprar bloques , cemento , arena , hierro entre otros materiales de construcción .
texts.en:
Diana is a small businesswoman who lives in the town of Ticuantepe together with her husband and daughters.  Her husband works for a private company and supports her with their household expenses.  Her future plan for her home is to re-build it with blocks.

Diana used her previous loans to expand her fruit and vegetable business.  The profits she made allowed her to repay her loans on time and in full.  She was also able to save up in order to buy her own plot of land where she currently lives.  Diana feels very happy with the support that she receives from Afodenic through their Kiva loans because without them she would not have been able to fulfil her dream of owning her own home.  She would like to use this loan to buy blocks, cement, sand, iron and other building supplies.

loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Rolando Jose

texts.es: El señor Rolando es un  humilde agricultor de la zona de Ticuantepe , junto a su esposa e hijos , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida y apoyar siempre en sus estudios a sus hijos , don Rolando desde hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de piña , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es que no cuenta con el recurso económico para poder darle un mejor mantenimientos a los frutos , ya que estos se encuentran de un mal color y no tienen el tamaño adecuado para la edad que tiene la piña . Don Rolando se siente contento por el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de los fondo Kiva ya que esto le permite rescatar su cultivo y mejorar cada ciclo su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rolando is a humble farmer from Ticuantepe area.  He lives together with his wife and children.  His plans for his family are to improve their living conditions and to always support his children in their education.

Rolando has been growing pineapples for several years.  The biggest problem that he faces is that he doesn't have enough money to better care for his fruit.  His pineapples are a bad color and aren't a suitable size for their age.  Rolando feels happy with the support that Afodenic offer through their Kiva fund because it will allow him to rescue his crops and he is able to improve his quality of life with each loan cycle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies

loans.name: Luvy Jeaneth

texts.es: Luvy Jeaneth se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa nueva. Hace más de 9 años que tiene este negocio, tiene un hijo bajo su cargo. Inicio esta actividad viajando a costa rica y con la ayuda de su esposo pudieron establecerse aquí y empezar este medio de vida. El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar pantalones, camisas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, ropa para niños entre otros. Espera con esta inversión aumentar sus ganancias. El sueño de Luvy es aumentar su capital en ganancias y darle mejor vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Luvy Jeaneth buys and sells new clothing.  She has been in this business for more than nine years.  She has one child in her care.  Luvy started this business traveling to Costa Rica and, with the help of her husband, they were able to settle there and start out in this line of work.

Luvy will use this loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, underwear, children's clothes, etc.  She hopes to be able to increase her profits through this investment.  Her dream is to increase her profits and provide her son with a better life.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, underwear and children's clothes

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: El señor , Rafael es un humilde agricultor de pitahaya de la zona de La concepción , Masaya , el ha bita junto a su esposa e hijos , ellos son una familia muy unida ya que todos trabajan al campo para poder darle el mantenimiento adecuado a cada planta de pitahaya , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar la calidad de vida y poder construir su humilde vivienda en una casa digna para toda su familia , don Rafael lleva muchos años trabajando las tierras que su papá le dio para que las cultivará , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es que no cuenta con el recurso económico para poder comprar fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para el cultivo . Se siente muy contento por la mano amiga que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de Kiva ya que son muchos los agricultores que se apoyan para sacar un cultivo de calidad y sobre todo su sabor natural a pitahaya .
texts.en: Rafael is a humble pitaya farmer from Masaya, La Concepción. He lives together with his wife and children. They are a very united family and they all work the land in order to provide suitable care for each pitaya plant. Rafael's plans for his family are to improve their quality of life and to turn their humble home into a decent house for the entire family. For many years, Rafael has been working the land that his dad gave him to grow crops on. The biggest problem that he faces is that he doesn't have enough money to buy fertilizers and the supplies he needs for his crops. He feels very grateful for the helping hand that he receives from Afodenic, through Kiva. There are many farmers who receive the support they need to grow good-quality crops and, above all, to obtain the full natural flavor from their pitaya.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies

loans.name: Lelis

texts.es: Lelis, de 54 años, es una mujer amable y muy dinámica, esta divorciada y es madre de seis hijos quienes ya son mayores e independientes, vive en casa de su madre junto a ella y una sobrina que le ayuda en algunas labores. El trabajo de Lelis consiste en la venta de abarrotes al por menor, pero también tiene como trabajo el de la venta de menú, este trabajo lo realiza en la casa de su mamá y lleva ya cuatro años haciéndolo. Manifiesta que el tener dos negocios puede mantenerse economicamente, trabaja a lado de su madre quien a pesar de su edad aún es una mujer fuerte y le ayuda en todo lo que puede. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene ingresos a diario, no mucho pero gana y ve su dinero todos los días, "Es bueno trabajar" acota. Por el momento ella se siente bien con el engocio que tiene y espera poder mantenerse así, pero tiene la idea de vender por la noches para aumentar sus ganancias. Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta con el grupo que trabaja ya que hasta el momento han demostrado ser muy responsable pagando sus cuotas a tiempo. Espera poder seguir trabajando juntos ya que le es de mucha ayuda, motivo por el cual esta muy agradecida. Con el monto solicitado, comprará productos para su bodega y algunos ingredientes e insumos para la preparación de comida, ya que si compra en cantidad le sale mas barato.
texts.en:
54-year old Lelis is a friendly, dynamic woman. She is divorced and has six adult children whom she no longer supports. She lives in her mother’s house with her mother and a niece who helps in Lelis’ business. She sells groceries as well as meals from the house, a job she’s been doing for four years.

By running two businesses, Lelis can support herself financially. Despite her age, her mother is still a strong woman who helps wherever she can. Lelis most enjoys getting a daily income from her job; it isn’t a lot but she earns something every day. “It’s good to work,” she comments. 

Right now Lelis is happy about the way the business is running, and she wants to keep it this way. However, she is thinking of opening in the evenings too to earn more money. This will be Lelis’ third loan with MFP. She is very happy with the group she’s with as they are responsible and make their repayments on time. She hopes to keep working with them as they provide a lot of support for which she is very grateful. 

With the loan Lelis will buy products for the store and ingredients and supplies for the food she prepares. If she buys in large quantities, it is much cheaper.

loans.use: to buy products for the store, and ingredients for the meals she sells

loans.name: Eddy De Jesus

texts.es: Eddy, esta muy agradecido por el apoyo y confianza recibido de los prestamistas de Kiva, por darle la oportunidad de sembra frijoles y maiz  , su cosecha fue muy buena, las ventas de maiz fueron excelentes para el y sobretodo el poder cubrir sus gastos y tener como ayudar a su familia, ahorra para el estudio de sus hijos. Es por ello que solicita un nuevo credito para sembra frijol y sembrar papas que es una de las metas que tiene en mente realizar con  este presttamo. Espera lograr sacar una produccion con calidad con buenos rendimientos.Un proposito que el tiene es lograr ampliar su terrenos de siembra.
texts.en:
Eddy is very grateful for the support and confidence in him that he has received from Kiva donors, and for giving him the opportunity to grow beans and maize. The harvest was good, sales were excellent, and above all he was able to cover his expenses, help his family, and save for his children’s education.

For these reasons Eddy is now seeking a new loan so he can grow beans and potatoes this time around. He expects to grow a quality crop with good yields. In the future he plans to buy more land on which to grow crops.

loans.use: to grow beans and to buy supplies for his potato crop

loans.name: Apolinar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Apolinar; el tiene 74 años de edad y es viudo y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de colchones, el socio vende en el mercado de Calca y también tiene una tienda de abarrotes donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y fideos, por medio de estos negocios el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de colchones y negocio de tienda de abarrotes. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar colchones y productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, leche y fideos al por mayor.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sr. Apolinar is a member of the Valle Sagrado de Calca Community Bank located in the district of Calca, in the province and department of the same name. 

He is 74 years old and a widower with three children. As well as his usual daily activities, Apolinar sells mattresses in the Calca market. He also runs a grocery store selling basics such as rice, sugar, milk, and pasta. With the income from these businesses, Apolinar is helping his children get ahead. Now he wishes to expand and improve the businesses. He is seeking a loan to buy mattresses and groceries at wholesale prices. 

Apolinar is happy to have this opportunity to obtain a loan and promises to make the repayments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy mattresses and groceries for his store

loans.name: Ezequiel

texts.es: El señor Ezequiel solicita  un préstamo para impermeabilizar y pintar su casa; por que en las temporadas de lluvias el agua se trasmina por consecuencia el techo se esta deteriorando. Ezequiel quiere prevenir que el problema se agrave  y tenga que gastar más de lo previsto. Para poder cubrir los gastos el trabaja en maquiladora de Lunes a Viernes y para tener un ingreso mas  se  queda tiempo extra. Ezequiel es padre  de dos niños, de los que quiere formar unos buenos ciudadanos y un mejor patrimonio. Para que ella pueda realizar su proyecto necesita comprar el material y pintura para que su casa quede protegida.
texts.en: Ezequiel is requesting a loan in order to waterproof and paint his home.  The roof is deteriorated and leaks during the rainy season.  He wants to prevent things from getting worse and having to spend more than expected.  He works in a factory, making goods for export, from Monday through Friday and works overtime in order to have a larger income.  Ezequiel has two children to whom he wants to be a good father and help them to become good citizens.  He needs to buy paint and other supplies in order to complete his project and protect his home.

loans.use: to buy paint and materials to repair his home.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Julio Cesar; el tiene 52 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de repuestos de carros y motos y también tiene un mototaxi que hace servicio de taxi en el distrito de Calca, el socio trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de estos negocios el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de compra y venta de repuestos de carros y motos y también mejorar en el negocio de transporte. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos de carros y motos y para el mantenimiento de la mototaxi para comprar repuestos.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA” communal bank, located in the Calca district; part of the Calca province and the Cusco department.
Julio Cesar is 52 years old, is married and has two children.  His business is buying and selling cars and motorcycles and also has a mototaxi to provide taxi services in Calca.  He works from 5:00 am to 6:00 pm and he gets his children ahead though this business.  He would like to expand his car and motorcycle business, as well as improve his transportation business.  He is asking for a loan to buy car and motorcycle spare parts and to perform maintenance on his mototaxi.

He is happy about this loan and is committed to meeting his payments.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Norma Veronica

texts.es: Norma Verónica es una mujer muy responsable, anteriormente vivía con sus padres de los cuales ayudaba en los gastos, pero hace algunos años fallecieron. Por el agradecimiento que le tenían por la ayuda  le heredaron la casa y el terreno donde actualmente vive, pero la casa ya esta un poco deteriorada por lo que quiere comenzar con arreglar el baño que esta en muy malas condiciones. Por tal motivo pide el préstamo para realizarle algunas me0joras como enjarrar, pintar, poner llaves nuevas en el lavabo y en la regadera, para esto necesita comprar material de construcción para que su proyecto quede terminado.
texts.en: Norma Veronica is a very responsible woman who used to live with her parents and she helped them with expenses. But they died some years ago.  In gratitude for her aid, they willed the house and land where she currently lives to her. But now, the house is somewhat deteriorated and for that reason, she wishes to begin reconstruction, starting with the bathroom which is in the worst condition. Consequently Norma is requesting a loan to carry out improvements, including masonry, painting, and installing new plumbing fixtures, including a shower. To do this, she needs to buy the necessary construction materials for her project to be completed.

loans.use: to buy construction material and pay laborers for needed home repairs.

loans.name: Tania Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO DE CALCA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Tania Isabel; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales como pollos y también la socia es profesora del nivel primario en el distrito de Calca, la socia las gallinas lo vende en forma ambulatoria, ella las hace engordar y crecer y los vende en el mercado de Calca, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar en el negocio de crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Tania Isabel belongs to the communal bank "Valle Sagrado de Calca."  This bank is located in the Calca district, which is in Calca province of the department of Cusco.

Tania Isabel is 37 years old.  She is single and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business raising animals such as chickens.  She is also an elementary school teacher in the district of Calca.  She sells her hens in an itinerant manner.  She fattens them and raises them and sells them in the Calca market.  Through this business she is able to support her children.  Tania Isabel wants to expand and improve her business raising animals.  She requests a loan to buy chickens at wholesale.

Tania Isabel is happy to have this loan, and she promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy chickens at wholesale

loans.name: Mayra

texts.es:
Mayra, de 46 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de Estelí, es odontóloga, madre de dos hijos de 20 y 14 años de edad respectivamente, esta casada. Ella nos cuenta que el estudiar esta profesión fue todo un reto para ella, debido  su origen humilde con mucho sacrificio logro graduarse, ella combinaba su trabajo con sus estudios ,ahorrando para un día lograr poner su propia sala odontológica, así lo hizo, es humilde sencilla pero atiende las necesidades de su población. 
Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar una turbina odontológica, ya que le es de gran necesidad, es parte de su material de trabajo. Esto le ayudara a ella a ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes y complementara parte de su herramienta de trabajo. Ella desea remodelar su sala odontológica, acondicionarla mejor.
texts.en: Mayra is 46 years old and she lives in the cit of Esteli. She is a dentist and she is the mother of two children, aged 20 and 14 respectively. She is married. She tells us that when she studied her profession it was the accomplishment of a goal for her. Given her humble beginnings she managed to graduate with a great deal of sacrifice. She combined her work with her studies, to save money so that one day she will have her own dentist's office. She has achieved it, although it is humble and simple but she is able to attend to the needs to the population. She requires a loan to purchase a dentistry drill, which she greatly needs. It is a working tool. This will help her to offer her clients better service and it will complement her working tools. She wants to remodel her dentist's office and to improve the furnishings.

loans.use: to purchase a dentistry drill

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es: El Sr. Ramiro es  una  persona  muy trabajadora ,  que  día  con día  a luchado   por  brindarle  una  estabilidad  a  su  familia,  en esta  ocasión  requiere  realizar    la  colocación D.  protecciones en las ventanas  D. su domicilio que  con esfuerzos adquirió, ya que  nos comenta   que  en ocasiones anteriores  ya   han  entrado a  robar  a  su  casa,  ve   en  el  crédito la posibilidad   D.  proteger  su vivienda  y a si  cuando  el se   vaya  a su trabajo lo  hará  D. una manera   tranquila  es  por  ello  que  esta  muy  contento  D.  habernos  encontrado.
texts.en: Ramiro is a very hardworking person, who, day after day struggles to proviD. stability to his family. At this time he needs to install protective structures on the windows of his house, which he attained through his efforts. He tells us that at times in the past his house has been robbed. Through this loan he will be able to protect his home and when he sets out to work he will do so with peace of mind. For this reason he is very happy to have come to know us.

loans.use: to install protective structures on his house windows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing for the season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase apples, grapes, guavas, bananas, watermelons, cantaloupes, papayas, rambutans, red mombins, and mangoes.

loans.name: Agustin Porfirio

texts.es: El señor Agustín , es un humilde agricultor de la zona de Ticuantepe , habita junto a su esposa la cual labora comerciante de frutas y verduras para apoyarlo con los gastos del hogar , los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida y poder apoyar a su hija en sus estudios para que logre llegar a la universidad , don Agustín desde hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de piña , la mayor afectación que se le presenta es que no cuenta con el recurso económico para poder comprar fertilizantes e insumos y si inducir la plantación para que esta no le afecten las plagas y se desarrollen muy bien . Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de los fondo Kiva  ya que los interés son bajos y hay comodidad de pagos.
texts.en: Agustin is a humble agriculturist in the region of Ticuantepe. He lives together with his wife who works as a fruits and vegetables merchant to help with he household expenses. His plans for his family are to improve their living conditions and to support his daughter in her studies, to enable her to attend university. Agustin has been cultivating pineapples for several years. The greatest challenge that he faces is that he doesn't have the financial resources to purchase fertilizers and farming materials for his plantation. This would prevent plagues and it would contribute to healthy growth. He is thankful for the support provided to him by Afodenic (Kiva Field Partner) through Kiva, where the interest rates are low and the easy payment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and farming products

loans.name: Minerva

texts.es:
La señora Minerva es una mujer muy emprendedora que le gusta trabajar y ser independiente. Hace 3 años inicio su negocio de la venta de tortillas de harina y frijoles cocidos que ella misma prepara en la comodidad de su hogar, el cual le beneficia ya que puede estar al tanto de las necesidades de sus pequeños y labores diarias de la casa.
Minerva ve que el negocio esta funcionando ya que variedad de amas de casas o trabajadoras por comodidad o falta de tiempo, le compra su producto ya que es con sabor casero que les encantan. Por los pedidos requeridos la materia prima no le bastece para la elaboración del producto por eso requiere de efectivo para comprar harina, maseca, frijol e ingredientes para poder cubrir sus pedidos de esta manera obtendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Minerva is an enterprising woman who likes to work and be independent.  She started her business making flour tortillas and cooked beans that she makes herself in the comfort of her own home three years ago.  This benefits her because she can watch over her children and do her daily household chores

Minerva has noted that the business is working out because many housewives or employees because of lack of time or just for their own comfort buy her products because they love its home-cooked flavor.  

Because of her pending orders, her on-hand raw materials are insufficient to make her products so this is why she needs cash to buy flour, Maseca brand corn flour, beans and other ingredients to fill her orders and earn higher profits.

loans.use: to buy flour, beans and other ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
En medio de una multitud de chicos jugando beisbol, encontramos un pequeño negocio de venta de zapatos, cuya propietario de doña Ramona, una señora de 61 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de Estelí, vende zapatos de todo estilo y tamaños, ella ha sido casi toda su vida comerciante antes tenia una pulpería y vendía ropa usada pero decidió dedicarse a la venta de zapatos pues estos le generaba mejores ganancias. En bases a estos negocios fue que logro preparar a sus 9 hijos  de los cuales dos están estudiando en la universidad. Nos expresa que el lugar donde tiene su pequeña venta de zapatos en un buen punto de venta, además se refresca la visa viendo jugar beisbol a los jóvenes de su vecindario que la mayoría de ellos se han convertido en sus clientes más recurrentes.
Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar inventario de zapatos con nuevos estilos y tamaños, de mejor calidad ya que estas son las características de mayor demanda de su producto, también quiere invertir en compra ropa usada para vender. Su meta es lograr ser mas prospero  y productivo su negocio mantenerlo surtido y ofrecer un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
In the midst of a multitude of young men playing baseball we came across a small shoe selling business belonging to Ramona, 61.  She’s from the city of Estelí and sells all types and sizes of shoes.  She’s been a merchant almost her entire life.  She used to have a grocery store and also sold used clothes but decided to go into shoe sales because they produce better profits.  

She was able to raise her nine children, two of whom are currently in university, thanks to these businesses.  She states that the place where she has her small shoe shop is a good sales point and besides she entertains herself watching the young men from the neighborhood, most of which have become her most loyal customers, play baseball.

She is requesting the loan to buy inventory of shoes in various styles and sizes and of better quality since these are the characteristics most in demand in her product.  She also wants to buy used clothes to sell.  Her goal is to make her business more productive and prosperous, to keep it well stocked and to provide better service.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chorizo and cheese.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
El señor Victor Manuel es padre de familia que siempre ve por el bienestar y comodidad, para poder sostener los gastos y ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida trabaja como chofer de transporte colectivo desde hace 8 años. El cuenta con su propio automóvil que utiliza para taxi  que circula en toda la ciudad para ofrecer a sus clientes amplio servicio.
En este momento necesita de un préstamo para darle mantenimiento a su herramienta de trabajo, lo que necesita es comprar algunas partes y aceite para que este en buenas condiciones. De esta manera ofrecerá mejor servicio y a sus clientes una mejor seguridad.
texts.en:
Víctor Manuel is a father who is always looking after his family’s comfort and wellbeing.  To be able to meet household expenses and offer them a better quality of life he’s been working as a collective taxi driver for 8 years.  He owns his car that he uses as a taxi circulating throughout the city to offer his customers wide service.

Presently, he needs a loan to service his work tool.  He needs to buy a few replacement parts and oil so that it will be in good operating condition so that he will be able to offer better service and increased safety to his customers.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
La señora Marisol esta casada y tiene dos hijos de los cuales quiere ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y un patrimonio digno. 
Hace 6 años adquirió su vivienda de interés social que es muy pequeña, por lo que se vio en la necesidad de construir un cuarto en la parte trasera, pero por falta de capital sólo le alcanzó poner techo de madera, con el paso del tiempo la techumbre de madera se dañó. Ahora tiene la necesidad de construir otro techo, pero optó por elaborarlo de concreto para que esté mayor reforzado y sea más duradero.
Para realizar su proyecto necesita comprar material de construcción como cemento, arena, varilla.
texts.en: Marisol is married and has two children who she would like to offer a better quality of life and a decent inheritance.  Six years ago, Marisol acquired her home through a government-subsidized housing scheme.  Her house is very small and so she decided that she needed to build an additional room out back.  However, because she lacked capital, she only managed to put up a wooden roof.  Owing to the material from which the roof is built, it is already deteriorating.  For this reason, she would like to use some concrete to make it stronger.  In order to carry out her project, she needs to buy building supplies such as cement, sand and metal rods.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand, and to pay labor costs

loans.name: Esmelina

texts.en:
Esmelina, 59, is a widow with one child. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. 

Esmelina sells ready-to-wear clothes to earn a living. She has had this business for five years. Each month she earns 8,400 PHP doing this work.

She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase new items to expand her product offering.  

 Esmelina has been a member of GDMPC for one year. In the future, she hopes to improve and expand her business.

About GDMPC: 

GDMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in Mindanao, Philippines. It has seven branches covering the provinces of Zamboanga del Sur, Lanao del Norte and Misamis Occidental. Its membership is composed mostly of farmers, fisherfolk and small entrepreneurs.

GDMPC: people empowering people.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

loans.name: Evamie

texts.en:
Evamie is married with one child. She is 26 years old and lives in Panduma Sr. Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines.

To earned a living, Evamie has a business selling personal products, and she has had this business for two years. Each month, she earns PHP 5,000 doing this work. 

She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

Evamie has been a member of GDMPC for almost one year. In the future, Evamie hopes to improve or expand her small business.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering.

location.town: Panduma Sr. Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen, 51, is married and has five children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur.

To earn a living, Carmen has owned and managed a sari-sari or "general store" for about two years. Each month, she earns PHP 10,400 doing this work.

She has requested a loan of 12,000 PHP to to purchase additional products to sell.

Carmen has been a member of GDMPC for three years. In the future, Carmen hope to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Mouena

texts.en:
Mouena, 26, is a single mother with one child.Mouena plants and harvests taro (a potato-like tuber) for sale. She has many years of experience in this business. Mouena needs a loan of WST 2450 to purchase general farm supplies and equipment. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 WST or US $125 per week) to financially support the immediate members of her family and pay for her son's school fee.

In 2008, Mouena joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Mouena's fourth loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase general farm supplies and equipment.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
